analyzed: phyogs kyi chos kyi rab tu dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba can tshul gsum 'chad pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'chad do //
translated: he now explains the nature of the trimodal condition, which is preceded by the division of the property of the position.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i dag bstan par bya ba la phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye ba don ci zhig yod //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i dag bstan par bya ba la phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye ba don ci zhig yod //
translated: What is the point of the division of the property of the position in the demonstration of the proof?

original: phyogs kyi chos bshad pa de tsam nyid srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos bshad pa de tsam nyid srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible that the mere explanation of the property of the position is the extent of the possibility.

original: phyogs gcig la ma grub pa la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang srid pa'i phyir ro snyam na ;
analyzed: phyogs gcig la ma grub pa la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang srid pa'i phyir ro snyam na ;
translated: But it is possible that the reason is not established with respect to one part of the subject, etc.

original: bshad pa / gtan tshigs kyi gnas skabs srid pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / gtan tshigs kyi gnas skabs srid pa ste /
translated: Response: The occasion of the reason is possible.

original: phyogs kyi chos gsum la go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos gsum la go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs srid pa ma yin te /
translated: The reason that causes understanding of the three properties of the subject is not possible.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga'o //
translated: [The reason] exists, does not exist, or both with respect to the similar class.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa ni byas pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa ni byas pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason ‚Äúbecause it is produced‚Äù exists with respect to the similar class.

original: gnyi ga ni @64b brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid do //üîΩmthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ni phyogs kyi chos 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: gnyi ga ni @64b brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid do // mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ni phyogs kyi chos 'gal ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it arises in dependence on effort‚Äù is both.üîΩ‚ÄúBecause it is an object of knowledge‚Äù does not exist with respect to the similar class.

original: 'gal ba yang go bar byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'gal ba yang go bar byed pa nyid do //
translated: The contradictory property of the subject is also a cause of understanding.

original: de'i phyir phyogs kyi chos ci snyed la go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs srid pa'i phyogs kyi chos de dag nyid gtan tshigs kyi skabs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyogs kyi chos ci snyed la go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs srid pa'i phyogs kyi chos de dag nyid gtan tshigs kyi skabs yin no //
translated: Therefore, the occasion of the reason is just those properties of the subject that are the reason that causes understanding of the three properties of the subject.

original: 'di 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs kyi skabs phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye bas mtshon ba de'i rang gi ngo bo mdor bsdus nas brjod ba ste /
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs kyi skabs phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye bas mtshon ba de'i rang gi ngo bo mdor bsdus nas brjod ba ste /
translated: In this context of the proof, the illustration of the division of the property of the subject is stated in brief.

original: gtan tshigs srid pa'i phyogs kyi chos nyid bstan pa yin gyi mi srid pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gtan tshigs srid pa'i phyogs kyi chos nyid bstan pa yin gyi mi srid pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the teaching of the property of the possible subject of the proof, not the impossible.

original: ci'i don du zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i don du zhe na /
translated: For what purpose?

original: gtan tshigs kyi skabs bde blag tu gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skabs bde blag tu gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For the easy understanding of the context of the proof.

original: mdor bsdus pas kyang don rgya chen po dag kyang bstan par 'gyur ba ni bde blag tu gzung ba'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pas kyang don rgya chen po dag kyang bstan par 'gyur ba ni bde blag tu gzung ba'o //
translated: Even a vast meaning can be taught by a brief statement, which is easy to understand.

original: de la phyogs kyi rnam pa 'di tsam zhig gtan tshigs kyi dngos po srid pa yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs srid tshad bde blag tu 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: de la phyogs kyi rnam pa 'di tsam zhig gtan tshigs kyi dngos po srid pa yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs srid tshad bde blag tu 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Since this much form of the subject is the possible entity of the proof, the extent of the possible proof is easily understood.

original: mdor bsdus pa brjod pa ni phyogs kyi chos ni rnam pa gsum te /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa brjod pa ni phyogs kyi chos ni rnam pa gsum te /
translated: The property of the subject is stated in brief as threefold:

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'o //
translated: existing in the similar class, not existing in the dissimilar class, and existing in both ways.

original: phyogs kyi chos de re re dag la ste /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos de re re dag la ste /
translated: Each of the properties of the component parts

original: gcig gcig la yang spyi rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: gcig gcig la yang spyi rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: has three modes.

original: ci ltar zhen /
analyzed: ci ltar zhen /
translated: How so?

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yang yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga ste /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yang yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga ste /
translated: The property of the dissimilar component part is threefold: existent, nonexistent, and both.

original: de dag gi dngos po de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi dngos po de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nature of that property.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa gang yin pa de mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa gnyi ga yin zhing /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa gang yin pa de mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa gnyi ga yin zhing /
translated: That which is existent in the similar component part is both existent and nonexistent in the dissimilar component part.

original: de bzhin du mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang gnyi ga gang yin pa de yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang gnyi ga gang yin pa de yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: And likewise, that which is nonexistent and both in the similar component part is also threefold in the dissimilar component part.

original: 'dir phyogs ni bsgrub bya'i chos dang chos can gyi spyi yin pas /
analyzed: 'dir phyogs ni bsgrub bya'i chos dang chos can gyi spyi yin pas /
translated: Here, the component part is the property to be established and the universal of the subject.

original: gal te de'i chos gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin na /
analyzed: gal te de'i chos gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin na /
translated: If the property of that is the reason,

original: de lta na ni 'o na chos dang chos can gyi spyi ma grub na gtan tshigs thams cad ma grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na chos dang chos can gyi spyi ma grub na gtan tshigs thams cad ma grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, in that case, if the universal of the property and the subject are not established, all reasons will be unestablished.

original: grub na yang gang la gtan tshigs brjod par bya ba'i bsgrub par bya ba gzhan ci zhig yod /
analyzed: grub na yang gang la gtan tshigs brjod par bya ba'i bsgrub par bya ba gzhan ci zhig yod /
translated: If it were established, then what other probandum is there to which the reason is to be applied?

original: de'i phyir 'dir phyogs kyi sgra dngos kyi don la 'jug par 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir phyogs kyi sgra dngos kyi don la 'jug par 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, here the term paksa is not asserted to be used in the sense of the actual position.

original: btags pa'i don yang ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: btags pa'i don yang ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is the meaning of the term paksa when it is used nominally?

original: phyogs ni chos can no zhes smos te /
analyzed: phyogs ni chos can no zhes smos te /
translated: Paksadharmah is stated.

original: phyogs kyi sgras ni 'dir chos can brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi sgras ni 'dir chos can brjod pa yin no //
translated: The term paksa in this context refers to the subject.

original: dgos pa ste /üîΩrgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir nye bar gdags @65a * //
analyzed: dgos pa ste / rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir nye bar gdags @65a * //
translated: The purpose is

original: bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bar mi bya'o //
translated: because there is no reason, it should not be nominally designated.

original: dgos pa 'ga' zhig gis rang bzhin gzhan sgro 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid nye bar btags ba'i brjod pa'i yul du 'gyur bar bya ba yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / dgos pa med bar gtso bo yi //
analyzed: dgos pa 'ga' zhig gis rang bzhin gzhan sgro 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid nye bar btags ba'i brjod pa'i yul du 'gyur bar bya ba yin te / 'di ltar / dgos pa med bar gtso bo yi //
translated: It is to be made into the object of expression that is nominally designated as having the characteristic of superimposing another nature for some purpose.üîΩThus,

original: sgra don las 'das 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: sgra don las 'das 'dod ma yin //
translated: The principal is not asserted to be beyond the meaning of words without purpose.

original: zhes bshad ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bshad ba yin no zhe na /
translated: This is what is explained.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir nye bar gdags par byas pa ni phyogs der sgro gdags su rung ba'i chos can yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nye bar gdags par byas pa ni phyogs der sgro gdags su rung ba'i chos can yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the imputation is made in order to make known the subject that is suitable to be imputed in that way.

original: yang ci'i phyir chos can 'ga' zhig der nye bar gdags su rung ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir chos can 'ga' zhig der nye bar gdags su rung ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Again, why is it that some subjects are suitable to be imputed in that way, but others are not?

original: phyogs de'i phyogs gcig yin pa ste /üîΩde'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs de'i phyogs gcig yin pa ste / de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a part of that subject.

original: gang zhig gang gi phyogs gcig yin pa de la de'i rang bzhin nye bar 'dogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi phyogs gcig yin pa de la de'i rang bzhin nye bar 'dogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that which is a part of something is imputed to have the nature of that.

original: snam bu'i phyogs gcig tshig pa la la ba tshig go zhes nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: snam bu'i phyogs gcig tshig pa la la ba tshig go zhes nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the imputation, ‚ÄúThe part of the cloth that is burned is burned.‚Äù

original: ci ste nye bar gdags su rung ba rtogs pa la don ci yod ce na /
analyzed: ci ste nye bar gdags su rung ba rtogs pa la don ci yod ce na /
translated: If it is asked what is the point of understanding what is suitable to be imputed,

original: chos can thams cad kyi zhes smos te /
analyzed: chos can thams cad kyi zhes smos te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúall subjects.‚Äù

original: thams cad kyi sgra ni bye rag med bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi sgra ni bye rag med bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word all is stated to include everything.

original: des na don 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na don 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning.

original: chos can gang yang rung ba'i chos gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin ba bkag ba ni nye bar gdags su rung ba'i chos can rtogs par dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: chos can gang yang rung ba'i chos gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin ba bkag ba ni nye bar gdags su rung ba'i chos can rtogs par dgos pa yin no //
translated: The refutation of any phenomenon whatsoever as a reason is for the purpose of understanding the subject that is suitable to be designated.

original: de lta yin dang ste nye bar gdags su rung ba'i chos can rtogs par gyur ba dang / mig gis gzung ba la sogs pa yongs su gzung ba ma spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang ste nye bar gdags su rung ba'i chos can rtogs par gyur ba dang / mig gis gzung ba la sogs pa yongs su gzung ba ma spangs pa yin no //
translated: If that is so, then when the subject that is suitable to be designated is understood, the apprehension of what is to be taken up, such as the eye, is not abandoned.

original: de'i phyir dgos pa yod pa'i phyir btags pa'i sgra yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //üîΩcig shos ni re zhig chos can gyi sgra dngos su smos pas kyang bsgrub bya'i chos can yongs su 'dzin ba bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir dgos pa yod pa'i phyir btags pa'i sgra yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no // cig shos ni re zhig chos can gyi sgra dngos su smos pas kyang bsgrub bya'i chos can yongs su 'dzin ba bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: Therefore, because there is a purpose, it is a term that is designated, but it is not a real thing.üîΩThe other party says that even if the term subject is mentioned explicitly, it is taught that the subject of the probandum is taken up.

original: gal te gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i chos zhes brjod pas kyang 'brel pa can gyi sgra yin pa'i phyir na rang dbang du gyur pa'i chos can gzhi lta grub ste /
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i chos zhes brjod pas kyang 'brel pa can gyi sgra yin pa'i phyir na rang dbang du gyur pa'i chos can gzhi lta grub ste /
translated: If it is said that the term dependent phenomenon is also a related term, then the independent subject, the basis, is established.

original: chos can zhes smos pa'i shugs kyis de grub bzhin du yang chos can zhes smos pas ni khyad par can gyi chos can nges par rtogs bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos can zhes smos pa'i shugs kyis de grub bzhin du yang chos can zhes smos pas ni khyad par can gyi chos can nges par rtogs bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù implies that it is established, but by saying ‚Äúsubject‚Äù it is understood that the specific subject is ascertained.

original: 'di snyam du dpe dang bsgrub bya'i chos can gnyi ga yang nges pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du dpe dang bsgrub bya'i chos can gnyi ga yang nges pa yin la /
translated: If you think that both the example and the subject of the probandum are ascertained,

original: de las kyang the tshom za ba nyid do snyam na /
analyzed: de las kyang the tshom za ba nyid do snyam na /
translated: and that even so there is doubt,

original: nye ba yin ba'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: nye ba yin ba'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: then the word ‚Äúbecause it is similar‚Äù is stated.

original: rjes su dpag @65b pa'i dus su bsgrub bya'i chos kyi gzhi nyid du blo la gnas bas na bsgrub bya'i chos can ni nye ba yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag @65b pa'i dus su bsgrub bya'i chos kyi gzhi nyid du blo la gnas bas na bsgrub bya'i chos can ni nye ba yin no //
translated: Because at the time of inference, the basis of the property of the probandum remains in the mind, the subject of the probandum is similar.

original: des na khyad bar can gcig rtogs bar bya ba la nye ba'i chos can gang yin pa de nyid 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na khyad bar can gcig rtogs bar bya ba la nye ba'i chos can gang yin pa de nyid 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, in order to understand the specific one, that which is the similar subject is grasped.

original: des na nye bar brtags pa'i phyogs kyi sgra ni don med do zhe na /
analyzed: des na nye bar brtags pa'i phyogs kyi sgra ni don med do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù in the proof is meaningless.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos can grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos can grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The subject of the probandum is not established,

original: gang gi phyir dpe'i chos can yang nye ba nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dpe'i chos can yang nye ba nyid do //
translated: because the example subject is also similar.

original: de yang skabs kyi bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i don du rtogs pa po'i blo la gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang skabs kyi bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i don du rtogs pa po'i blo la gnas pa nyid do //
translated: Moreover, it is the very thing that resides in the mind of the one who understands for the purpose of establishing the probandum in a particular context.

original: des na nye ba yin pa'i phyir de yang gzung bar thal lo //
analyzed: des na nye ba yin pa'i phyir de yang gzung bar thal lo //
translated: Therefore, because it is close, it is also grasped.

original: dpe'i chos can 'dzin na ni chos can gyi chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bas dpe'i chos can la yod pa gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di brjod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: dpe'i chos can 'dzin na ni chos can gyi chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bas dpe'i chos can la yod pa gang yin pa de gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di brjod par 'gyur na /
translated: If the example-property-possessor is grasped, then it is said that the property of the property-possessor is the reason. Thus, the meaning of ‚Äúthat which exists in the example-property-possessor is the reason‚Äù is expressed.

original: de yang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par brjod pa nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par brjod pa nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, that is indicated by the very statement of its existence in the similar class.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na chos can gyi chos zhes brjod bas gang la gtan tshigs yod par ma grub pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos yin par yongs su gzung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na chos can gyi chos zhes brjod bas gang la gtan tshigs yod par ma grub pa'i bsgrub bya'i chos yin par yongs su gzung ngo zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the reason is called the property of the property-possessor because the probandum is not established as existing in the reason, then what is the probandum that is taken to be the property of the property-possessor?

original: de lta na ni 'o na rtsod pa brgyud pa 'dis chos can gyi sgra 'dis bsgrub bya'i chos can 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bshad par bya ba la 'chad pa pos 'bad par bya dgos so //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na rtsod pa brgyud pa 'dis chos can gyi sgra 'dis bsgrub bya'i chos can 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bshad par bya ba la 'chad pa pos 'bad par bya dgos so //
translated: If that is so, then this whole discussion is pointless, since the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù refers to the property-possessor that is the object to be established.

original: bstan par dka' ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'bad pa de yang nye bar btags pa'i don phyogs kyi sgra smos pa tsam gyis spangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan par dka' ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'bad pa de yang nye bar btags pa'i don phyogs kyi sgra smos pa tsam gyis spangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The effort to explain this is wasted, since the mere mention of the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù eliminates the need for the explanation.

original: skyon 'di spangs pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad de /üîΩbshad ma thag pa'i shugs des don te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can go bar bya ba na rtogs bar dka' bar 'gyur bas rtogs dka' ba de yang phyogs kyi sgra spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: skyon 'di spangs pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad de / bshad ma thag pa'i shugs des don te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can go bar bya ba na rtogs bar dka' bar 'gyur bas rtogs dka' ba de yang phyogs kyi sgra spangs pa yin no //
translated: But that is not the only problem.üîΩThe mere mention of the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù also eliminates the need for the explanation of the difficult point that the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is used to refer to the property-possessor that is the object to be established.üîΩIt is reasonable to use the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù because it eliminates the need for the explanation of the difficult point that the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is used to refer to the property-possessor that is the object to be established.

original: bstan par mtshungs pa dang / nye bar btags pa tsam gyis bstan par dka' ba dang / rtogs par dka' ba yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba'i phyir nye bar btags pa nyid rigs so //
analyzed: bstan par mtshungs pa dang / nye bar btags pa tsam gyis bstan par dka' ba dang / rtogs par dka' ba yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba'i phyir nye bar btags pa nyid rigs so //
translated: The word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is used because it eliminates the need for the explanation of the difficult point that the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is used to refer to the property-possessor that is the object to be established.

original: re zhig 'di zlas dbye ba'i bsdu ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig 'di zlas dbye ba'i bsdu ba ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not a compound in the sense of a copulative compound,

original: ma ning gi rtags dang / gnyis kyi tshig tu thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma ning gi rtags dang / gnyis kyi tshig tu thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would then be a neuter noun and would be in the dual number.

original: 'bru mang po pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bru mang po pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not a compound in the sense of a tatpurusa compound,

original: bsdu ba'i mthar aa nid kyi rkyen du thal ba'i phyir dang / don kyang 'gal ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i mthar aa nid kyi rkyen du thal ba'i phyir dang / don kyang 'gal ba'i phyir te /
translated: because it would then end in a genitive particle and the meaning would be contradictory,

original: de nyid chos can yin la de nyid chos yin pa ni ma yin no //üîΩ'di nyid kyi phyir 'di las 'don pa yang @66a * //
analyzed: de nyid chos can yin la de nyid chos yin pa ni ma yin no // 'di nyid kyi phyir 'di las 'don pa yang @66a * //
translated: for it is not the same thing that is the substratum and the quality.

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: For this very reason, it is not a compound in the sense of a bahuvrihi.üîΩIt is a compound in the sense of a dvandva,

original: lhag mar gyur pas na drug pa'i bsdu ba yin par bsams nas /
analyzed: lhag mar gyur pas na drug pa'i bsdu ba yin par bsams nas /
translated: because it is thought that the two are separate,

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na zhes smos so //üîΩdrug pa'i bsdu ba ni rgyal po'i skyes bu la sogs pa dag la rje bo gzhan rnam par gcod par mthong ste /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na zhes smos so // drug pa'i bsdu ba ni rgyal po'i skyes bu la sogs pa dag la rje bo gzhan rnam par gcod par mthong ste /
translated: and it is said that they are the property of the subject.üîΩA dvandva compound is seen to exclude other masters,

original: rgyal po'i skyes bu yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i skyes bu yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhe'o //
translated: as in the case of the king‚Äôs men, where it is said, ‚ÄúHe is the king‚Äôs man, not another‚Äôs.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang phyogs kyi chos yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang phyogs kyi chos yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, here, too, the property of the subject is distinguished from the other, by the words, ‚ÄúIt is the property of the subject, but not of the other.‚Äù

original: des na chos can gyi rnam par gcod pa la ltos pa gzhan dpe'i chos can la mi 'jug pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na chos can gyi rnam par gcod pa la ltos pa gzhan dpe'i chos can la mi 'jug pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the property of the subject is distinguished in dependence on the exclusion of the other, and the example is not the cause of the non-engagement of the property of the subject.

original: dgag pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos te /
analyzed: dgag pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes smos te /
translated: The word ‚Äúnot‚Äù is for the purpose of negation.

original: thun mong ma yin pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: It is not for the purpose of the uncommon.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ma 'brel pa bzlog pa'i rgyus chos khyad par du byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ma 'brel pa bzlog pa'i rgyus chos khyad par du byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the property is distinguished by the cause of the exclusion of the unconnected.

original: rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is for the purpose of the exclusion.

original: phyogs de ni bdag nyid dang ma 'brel par dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir chos khyad par du byed ba yin no //
analyzed: phyogs de ni bdag nyid dang ma 'brel par dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir chos khyad par du byed ba yin no //
translated: The property is distinguished for the purpose of removing the doubt that the subject is unconnected with itself.

original: ci la lar ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas khyad par du byas pa yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci la lar ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas khyad par du byas pa yod dam zhe na /
translated: Is there anywhere a distinction by the exclusion of the unconnected?

original: yong do zhes bshad pa ni dper na nag pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yong do zhes bshad pa ni dper na nag pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is explained that there is, for example, ‚Äúblack.‚Äù

original: nag pa 'phong skyen pa nyid la ni bdag nyid dang ma 'brel par dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir 'phong skyen pa nyid khyad par du byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: nag pa 'phong skyen pa nyid la ni bdag nyid dang ma 'brel par dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir 'phong skyen pa nyid khyad par du byed pa yin gyi /
translated: In the case of Arjuna's skill in archery, the skill is specified in order to eliminate the doubt that it is not connected with himself.

original: gzhan dang lhan cig 'brel pa bzlog pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dang lhan cig 'brel pa bzlog pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not in order to eliminate the connection with another.

original: 'dod pa bstan nas mi 'dod pa'i khyad par spang par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas ni ma yin te zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'dod pa bstan nas mi 'dod pa'i khyad par spang par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas ni ma yin te zhes smos so //
translated: Having shown what is desired, in order to eliminate the undesirable distinction, he says, it is not by the exclusion of what is connected with another.

original: dper na srid sgrub ces bya ba la /
analyzed: dper na srid sgrub ces bya ba la /
translated: For example, in the case of Arjuna,

original: srid sgrub ni 'phong skyen bar rab tu grags pa yin pas ma 'brel par dogs pa ni med kyi /
analyzed: srid sgrub ni 'phong skyen bar rab tu grags pa yin pas ma 'brel par dogs pa ni med kyi /
translated: since Arjuna is well-known as skilled in archery, there is no doubt of disconnection.

original: 'on kyang gzhan dang 'brel par ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan dang 'brel par ro //
translated: However, there is connection with another.

original: des na 'phong skyen pa nyid ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: des na 'phong skyen pa nyid ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i phyir yin no //
translated: Therefore, skill in archery is for the exclusion of what is connected with another.

original: 'di la blo gros rmongs pa'i dogs pa'i gnas rnam par gcad par bya ba yin pas na /
analyzed: 'di la blo gros rmongs pa'i dogs pa'i gnas rnam par gcad par bya ba yin pas na /
translated: In this case, the basis of doubt due to confusion of the mind is to be eliminated.

original: gang gi tshe ldan par ma shes pa'i phyir mi ldan par dogs pa de'i tshe ma 'brel par rnam par gcad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ldan par ma shes pa'i phyir mi ldan par dogs pa de'i tshe ma 'brel par rnam par gcad par bya ba yin no //
translated: When it is not known that it is possessed, then it is to be excluded as not possessed.

original: gang gi tshe 'brel par shes pas ma 'brel ba rnam par gcad pa de'i tshe gzhan dang ldan par dogs pa'i phyir gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'brel par shes pas ma 'brel ba rnam par gcad pa de'i tshe gzhan dang ldan par dogs pa'i phyir gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcad par bya ba yin no //
translated: When it is known that it is possessed, then it is to be excluded as possessed of something else, because it is suspected of being possessed of something else.

original: de lta yin dang gnas skabs 'ga' zhig @66b las rgyal po skyes bu'i rje bo shes pa la rje bo spyir shes pas khyad par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yang smos pa yin pas gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang gnas skabs 'ga' zhig @66b las rgyal po skyes bu'i rje bo shes pa la rje bo spyir shes pas khyad par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yang smos pa yin pas gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa rigs pa yin no //
translated: If that were so, then in some circumstances, the king, who is the lord of men, would be known as the lord in general, and the specific would be understood. Therefore, it is reasonable to exclude possession of something else.

original: 'dir ni phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes gnas ma rtogs pa'i phyir mi ldan par dogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni phyogs kyi chos gtan tshigs yin no zhes gnas ma rtogs pa'i phyir mi ldan par dogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba yin no //
translated: Here, because the position of the property is not understood, it is to be excluded as suspected of not being possessed.

original: de dang ldan pa la ni gzhan dang ldan par rtogs par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa la ni gzhan dang ldan par rtogs par bya ba yin te /
translated: When it is possessed of that, it is to be understood as possessed of something else.

original: des na ma 'brel ba rnam par bcad pa'i sngon rol du ni dogs pa med pa rnam par gcad par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i 'phros pa 'di ni le'u gnyis par bshad zin to //
analyzed: des na ma 'brel ba rnam par bcad pa'i sngon rol du ni dogs pa med pa rnam par gcad par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i 'phros pa 'di ni le'u gnyis par bshad zin to //
translated: Therefore, prior to the exclusion of non-connection, the exclusion of the absence of doubt is not to be done. This continuation has been explained in Chapter Two.

original: ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas phyogs khyad par du byed pas phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pas phyogs khyad par du byed pas phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: By the exclusion of non-connection, the position is specified. Whatever is a property of the position is threefold.

original: rnam pa gsum ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'o //
translated: The three modes are: existing in the similar position, not existing in the dissimilar position, and existing in both modes.

original: dang po ni rnam pa gzhan bsdu ba'i don te /
analyzed: dang po ni rnam pa gzhan bsdu ba'i don te /
translated: The first is for the purpose of including other modes.

original: de lta ma yin na yod pa dang med pa nyid rnam pa gnyi ga yin pa go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na yod pa dang med pa nyid rnam pa gnyi ga yin pa go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, existing and not existing would be understood as the two modes.

original: rnam pa gsum po de ni re re ste gcig cig kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum po de ni re re ste gcig cig kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
translated: That threefold mode is each, and one is also threefold.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa gang yin pa de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa gang yin pa de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga'o //
translated: Whatever exists in the similar position is in the dissimilar position, not existing, and both.

original: de bzhin du mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang / gnyi ga gang yin pa de yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang / gnyi ga gang yin pa de yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Likewise, the three types of reason that are not present in the concordant class and that are present in both are the three types of reason that are present in the discordant class.

original: gang la phyogs kyi chos rab tu dbye bar bya ba'i mthun pa'i phyogs sam mi ma thun pa'i phyogs de yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang la phyogs kyi chos rab tu dbye bar bya ba'i mthun pa'i phyogs sam mi ma thun pa'i phyogs de yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the concordant class or discordant class in regard to which the property of the position is to be distinguished?

original: bshad pa / mthun pa'i phyogs ni 'ga' zhig phyogs dang don mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / mthun pa'i phyogs ni 'ga' zhig phyogs dang don mthun pa yin no //
translated: The concordant class is that which is similar to the position and the object.

original: 'di ltar phyogs dang 'dra ba'i phyir na don de nyid phyogs zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs dang 'dra ba'i phyir na don de nyid phyogs zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Because it is similar to the position, that very object is called the position.

original: 'dra ba'i don kyang mthun pa'i sgra yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba'i don kyang mthun pa'i sgra yin te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúsimilar‚Äù is ‚Äúconcordant.‚Äù

original: phyogs dang mtshungs pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: phyogs dang mtshungs pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs so //
translated: The concordant class is that which is similar to the position.

original: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag mtshungs pa la ni gtan tshigs kyi rgyu mtshan yang srid pa 'dir ni bsgrub bya'i rgyu mtshan gyis mtshungs pa yin par 'dod pas bshad pa /
analyzed: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag mtshungs pa la ni gtan tshigs kyi rgyu mtshan yang srid pa 'dir ni bsgrub bya'i rgyu mtshan gyis mtshungs pa yin par 'dod pas bshad pa /
translated: The reason is also possible in regard to that which is similar to the position. Here, since similarity to the reason is asserted to be similarity to the object of affirmation, it is said:

original: the tshom za ba'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yang yin la /üîΩchos kyang yin te /
analyzed: the tshom za ba'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yang yin la / chos kyang yin te /
translated: It is the probandum because it is doubted,

original: bsten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and it is a property because it is the object of the activity of the proof.üîΩThe probandum is the object of the activity of the proof because it is the object of the activity of the proof.

original: 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that the probandum is the object of the activity of the proof.

original: khyad par zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The qualifier is not the probandum.

original: @67a * // des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi zhes ni tshig rnam par ma sbyar gyi /
analyzed: @67a * // des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi spyi zhes ni tshig rnam par ma sbyar gyi /
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúproperty‚Äù is not connected to the word ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúuniversal of the probandum.‚Äù

original: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos nyid spyi yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos nyid spyi yin te /
translated: However, the probandum itself is the universal.

original: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshungs pa nyid de mnyam pa yin te /
analyzed: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshungs pa nyid de mnyam pa yin te /
translated: It is the sameness of the similar class, that is, the sameness of the similar class.

original: don mthun pa ni des byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don mthun pa ni des byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the similar class is produced by that.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
translated: The dissimilar class is the absence of the probandum.

original: gal te med pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na phyogs kyi chos yod pa de de la ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te med pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin na phyogs kyi chos yod pa de de la ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: If the dissimilar class is the absence of the probandum, how can the property of the subject that exists be that?

original: med pa la med par 'gyur du zin kyang dngos po'i chos yod pa ni med pa la 'thad pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: med pa la med par 'gyur du zin kyang dngos po'i chos yod pa ni med pa la 'thad pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it were the case that non-existence were non-existent, then the property of an existent thing would not be tenable as non-existent.

original: med pa la yod pa yod do zhes su zhig smra /
analyzed: med pa la yod pa yod do zhes su zhig smra /
translated: But who says that existence exists in non-existence?

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de med pa tsam ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de med pa tsam ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin gyi /
translated: Because mere non-existence of the property to be established is not the discordant side.

original: 'on kyang bzlog pa mthun pa'i phyogs kyis stong pa'i don thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: 'on kyang bzlog pa mthun pa'i phyogs kyis stong pa'i don thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
translated: However, all objects that are empty of the opposite concordant side are the discordant side.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgras brjod par bya ba ma yin pa gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgras brjod par bya ba ma yin pa gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no //
translated: All that is not to be expressed by the term concordant side is the discordant side.

original: bzlog pa de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzlog pa de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that opposite?

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i med pa dper na nam mkha' med par smra ba la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i med pa dper na nam mkha' med par smra ba la /
translated: Because the non-existence of the property to be established, for example, in the case of the proponent of non-existent space,

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi rtag pa'i nam mkha' med pa lta bu dang / ma yin pa de bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin de dang bral ba'i don gzhan pa dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi rtag pa'i nam mkha' med pa lta bu dang / ma yin pa de bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin de dang bral ba'i don gzhan pa dang 'gal lo //
translated: The opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.

original: grang ba'i reg pa dang / grang ba yang ma yin dro ba yang ma yin pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dro ba spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: grang ba'i reg pa dang / grang ba yang ma yin dro ba yang ma yin pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dro ba spangs pa yin te /
translated: The opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.

original: des na de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes brjod par bya ba yin no //üîΩci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: des na de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes brjod par bya ba yin no // ci ltar zhe na /
translated: The opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.

original: de nyid ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes smos te /üîΩphyogs med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩmi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgra'i brjod bya ni phyogs ma yin la /
analyzed: de nyid ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes smos te / phyogs med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgra'i brjod bya ni phyogs ma yin la /
translated: The opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.

original: don gsum po 'di yang phyogs ma yin pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: don gsum po 'di yang phyogs ma yin pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
translated: The opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.

original: 'gal ba dang gzhan pa dngos po nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'gal ba dang gzhan pa dngos po nyid ma yin nam /
translated: The opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.üîΩThe opposite of the probandum is the opposite of the object that is devoid of that nature.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The opposite of the probandum is the

original: bshad pa / phyogs med pa'i rang bzhin de ni brjod par 'dod pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgras brjod par bya ba'i bzlog pa dang 'gal ba dang gzhan pa dag la yang mtshungs pa ste khyad par med pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / phyogs med pa'i rang bzhin de ni brjod par 'dod pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgras brjod par bya ba'i bzlog pa dang 'gal ba dang gzhan pa dag la yang mtshungs pa ste khyad par med pa yin no //
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: That which is not a position is the same as that which is to be expressed, the opposite of the position that is not compatible with what is to be expressed, that which is contradictory, and that which is different.

original: ci @67b ltar med pa'i phyogs ma yin pa de bzhin du 'gal ba dang gzhan pa yang phyogs ma yin pas na phyogs med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci @67b ltar med pa'i phyogs ma yin pa de bzhin du 'gal ba dang gzhan pa yang phyogs ma yin pas na phyogs med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as it is not a position that is not nonexistent, it is also not a position that is contradictory or different. Thus the meaning is that it is not a position.

original: gal te 'gal ba dang gzhan pa phyogs ma yin yang med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'gal ba dang gzhan pa phyogs ma yin yang med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: If it is not a position that is contradictory or different, but it is not nonexistent,

original: dngos po yod pa nyid ni yin pas ci ltar med pa brjod pas sgras brjod par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po yod pa nyid ni yin pas ci ltar med pa brjod pas sgras brjod par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: then since it is an existent thing, how could it be expressed by the term ‚Äúnonexistent‚Äù?

original: bshad pa / ldog pa rtogs pa ste phyogs med par shes par ni med pa dang gzhan pa dang 'gal ba thams cad la 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / ldog pa rtogs pa ste phyogs med par shes par ni med pa dang gzhan pa dang 'gal ba thams cad la 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: We respond: It is understood through the realization of the opposite, because all that is not a position, that is nonexistent, different, and contradictory, are the same.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this.

original: phyogs med pa zhes bya ba ngo bo dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs med pa zhes bya ba ngo bo dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The so-called ‚Äúnon-direction‚Äù is not endowed with an entity.

original: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa can gyi blos tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa can gyi blos tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: However, it is a conventional expression of the conceptual mind.

original: de yang ci ltar gtan nas med par rtogs pa la tha snyad byed pa de bzhin du 'gal ba dang / gzhan par rtogs pa la yang yin no //
analyzed: de yang ci ltar gtan nas med par rtogs pa la tha snyad byed pa de bzhin du 'gal ba dang / gzhan par rtogs pa la yang yin no //
translated: And just as it is a conventional expression for the realization of utter non-existence, it is also for the realization of contradiction and difference.

original: des na ci ltar gtan med pa phyogs med pa yin pa de bzhin du dngos po yang yin te /
analyzed: des na ci ltar gtan med pa phyogs med pa yin pa de bzhin du dngos po yang yin te /
translated: Therefore, just as utter non-existence is non-direction, so too is entity.

original: de rtogs pa na med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs pa na med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when it is realized, it becomes the conventional expression of non-existence.

original: gal te med par rtogs pa nyid phyogs med pa'i bdag nyid rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te med par rtogs pa nyid phyogs med pa'i bdag nyid rtogs pa yin te /
translated: If the realization of non-existence is the realization of the nature of non-direction,

original: de ni rang bzhin med pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin med pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is because it is devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: rang gi ngo bos rtogs pa'i 'gal ba dang gzhan pa dag go //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos rtogs pa'i 'gal ba dang gzhan pa dag go //
translated: It is contradictory and different from the realization of its own nature.

original: ci ltar phyogs med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs she na /
analyzed: ci ltar phyogs med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs she na /
translated: How is it realized as having the nature of non-direction?

original: dngos sam shugs kyis zhes smos so //
analyzed: dngos sam shugs kyis zhes smos so //
translated: It is said ‚Äúdirectly or indirectly.‚Äù

original: bkag pa ni phyogs med pa nyid yin pa des na rtogs par dngos su phyogs med pa rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: bkag pa ni phyogs med pa nyid yin pa des na rtogs par dngos su phyogs med pa rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The negation is the absence of a position. Therefore, the understanding of the negation is the direct understanding of the absence of a position.

original: gzhan pa dang 'gal ba ni phyogs med pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan pa dang 'gal ba ni phyogs med pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: The other and the contradictory are not the absence of a position.

original: 'on te rang bzhin gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te rang bzhin gzhan nyid do //
translated: Or, they are different in nature.

original: des na de dag rtogs pa ni dngos su phyogs med par rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na de dag rtogs pa ni dngos su phyogs med par rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the understanding of those is not the direct understanding of the absence of a position.

original: 'on kyang shugs kyis yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang shugs kyis yin no //
translated: But it is indirect.

original: gal te phyogs ma yin pa de lta na de 'gal ba 'am phyogs las gzhan pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te phyogs ma yin pa de lta na de 'gal ba 'am phyogs las gzhan pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If the absence of a position is like that, then it would be contradictory or a different entity from the position.

original: gzhan pa dang 'gal ba yongs su gcod pa ni phyogs nyid rnam par bcad pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan pa dang 'gal ba dag gi rang bzhin khyad par can rtogs pa nyid kyi shugs kyis phyogs med par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan pa dang 'gal ba yongs su gcod pa ni phyogs nyid rnam par bcad pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan pa dang 'gal ba dag gi rang bzhin khyad par can rtogs pa nyid kyi shugs kyis phyogs med par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The determination of the other and the contradictory is the exclusion of the position itself. Therefore, the understanding of the special nature of the other and the contradictory is indirectly the understanding of the absence of a position.

original: gang gi phyir bkag pa rtogs pa ni dngos su phyogs med par rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bkag pa rtogs pa ni dngos su phyogs med par rtogs pa yin la /
translated: Because the understanding of the negation is the direct understanding of the absence of a position.

original: gzhan pa dang 'gal ba rtogs pa shugs @68a * //
analyzed: gzhan pa dang 'gal ba rtogs pa shugs @68a * //
translated: and the understanding of the contradiction with others is implied.

original: kyis yin pa de'i phyir rtogs pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs med pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni thams cad la khyad par med pa yin te /
analyzed: kyis yin pa de'i phyir rtogs pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs med pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni thams cad la khyad par med pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the absence of a nature that is a basis for understanding is the same for all.

original: des na thams cad mi mthun pa'i phyogs su brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na thams cad mi mthun pa'i phyogs su brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Hence, all are described as being discordant.

original: ci phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa 'di'i phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa nyid du nges pa nyid go bar byed par gzung ngam /
analyzed: ci phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa 'di'i phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa nyid du nges pa nyid go bar byed par gzung ngam /
translated: Is it ascertained that the property of the position exists and does not exist, respectively, in the similar and dissimilar positions, in dependence on the property of the position that is understood?

original: 'on te yod pa tsam zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te yod pa tsam zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Or is it ascertained by mere existence?üîΩNƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds:

original: bshad pa / phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu bshad pa gang yin pa 'di'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa ni nges pa yin par gzung ngo //
analyzed: bshad pa / phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu bshad pa gang yin pa 'di'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i phyogs kyi chos nyid dang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa ni nges pa yin par gzung ngo //
translated: The property of the position that is ascertained as existing or not existing, respectively, in the similar and dissimilar positions, in dependence on the nine aspects of the property of the position that is explained here, is called ‚Äúthe reality of the property of the position.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa dag la zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs nyid dang / 'gal ba dang ma nges pa dag la'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa dag la zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs nyid dang / 'gal ba dang ma nges pa dag la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of reasons, etc.‚Äù means in the case of reasons, contradictions, and indecisions.

original: ma grub pa ni 'dir mi gzung ste /
analyzed: ma grub pa ni 'dir mi gzung ste /
translated: Nonestablishment is not included here.

original: gang la phyogs kyi chos nyid du nges pa de la ma grub pa nyid skyon med do //
analyzed: gang la phyogs kyi chos nyid du nges pa de la ma grub pa nyid skyon med do //
translated: When there is certainty about the property of the position, nonestablishment is not a fault.

original: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa la ltos pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAs appropriate‚Äù means in relation to existence and nonexistence.

original: gtan tshigs ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par nges pa yin la /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par nges pa yin la /
translated: A reason is ascertained to be present in similar instances and absent in dissimilar instances.

original: 'gal ba ni mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba ni mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par nges pa yin no //
translated: A contradiction is ascertained to be absent in similar instances and present in dissimilar instances.

original: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa rnams ni gang gis rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa'i sgrub par byed pa de dag gis nges pa sgrub par byed pa yin par gzung ngo //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa rnams ni gang gis rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa'i sgrub par byed pa de dag gis nges pa sgrub par byed pa yin par gzung ngo //
translated: The property of the position, etc., are ascertained by the proof statements that make them known.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa the tshom gyi rang bzhin dag dang / phyin ci log gi rang bzhin dag ni rtogs pa zhes bya ba nges pa'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa the tshom gyi rang bzhin dag dang / phyin ci log gi rang bzhin dag ni rtogs pa zhes bya ba nges pa'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and the nature of doubt, which is the cause of the ascertainment of what is accepted and what is not accepted, and the nature of error, are not the means of ascertaining what is to be established, because they are called ‚Äúunderstanding.‚Äù

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this:

original: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba ni go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba ni go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The contradictory reason is the cause of understanding.

original: sgron ma bzhin du rung ba tsam gyis ni gtan tshigs kyi don gyis gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgron ma bzhin du rung ba tsam gyis ni gtan tshigs kyi don gyis gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the meaning of the reason is made clear by mere suitability, like a lamp.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: don de med na mi 'byung bar nges pa phyogs 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba med na mi 'byung bar nges pa dran pa nyid bsgrub bya rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: don de med na mi 'byung bar nges pa phyogs 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba med na mi 'byung bar nges pa dran pa nyid bsgrub bya rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: The memory of the ascertainment that the reason is not seen in the absence of the object is the reason that causes the ascertainment of the probandum.

original: de ltar dran pa nyid la bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar dran pa nyid la bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in that way, the probandum is ascertained by memory alone.

original: des na med na mi 'byung ba'i rab bzhin @68b la the tshom za ba dang / phyin ci log pa dag ni go par byed pa nyid ma yin te /üîΩsgra gang la phyin ci log gam /
analyzed: des na med na mi 'byung ba'i rab bzhin @68b la the tshom za ba dang / phyin ci log pa dag ni go par byed pa nyid ma yin te / sgra gang la phyin ci log gam /
translated: Therefore, when there is doubt or error with regard to the relation of invariable concomitance, the word does not operate to communicate the meaning.

original: the tshom gyi rtog pa yod pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rtog pa yod pa de bzhin no //
translated: Just as when there is doubt or error with regard to the word itself.

original: khyad par can gyi rang bzhin gyi sgra ni brda'i dus su brda'i dbang gis don 'ga' zhig dang med na mi 'byung bar mthong la /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi rang bzhin gyi sgra ni brda'i dus su brda'i dbang gis don 'ga' zhig dang med na mi 'byung bar mthong la /
translated: When the word has a specific nature, at the time of the convention one sees that it is invariably concomitant with some meaning by virtue of the convention.

original: yang don de nyid dang med na mi 'byung bar nges pa na don rtogs pa'i yan lag yin no //
analyzed: yang don de nyid dang med na mi 'byung bar nges pa na don rtogs pa'i yan lag yin no //
translated: And when one is certain that it is invariably concomitant with that very meaning, it is a factor in understanding the meaning.

original: gang gi tshe sgra de the tshom za ba 'am /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgra de the tshom za ba 'am /
translated: But when one doubts the word,

original: phyin ci log tu nges pa 'am /
analyzed: phyin ci log tu nges pa 'am /
translated: or is mistaken about it,

original: nges par byas su zin kyang gang gi tshe brda'i dus su mthong ba'i don dang med na mi 'byung bar the tshom za ba 'am /
analyzed: nges par byas su zin kyang gang gi tshe brda'i dus su mthong ba'i don dang med na mi 'byung bar the tshom za ba 'am /
translated: or even though one is certain, when one doubts that it is invariably concomitant with the meaning one saw at the time of the convention,

original: don gzhan dang 'brel par phyin ci log pa de'i tshe go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan dang 'brel par phyin ci log pa de'i tshe go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: or is mistaken that it is related to another meaning, then it does not operate to communicate the meaning.

original: sgra'i go bar byed pa nyid ni don med na mi 'byung bar nges pa nyid yin gyi bya ba gzhan ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i go bar byed pa nyid ni don med na mi 'byung bar nges pa nyid yin gyi bya ba gzhan ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The mere indication of the meaning is the ascertainment that the meaning is not absent when the word is present; there is no other activity.

original: sgra de ltar rtogs pa na don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir nges pa nyid 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa 'am /
analyzed: sgra de ltar rtogs pa na don rtogs pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir nges pa nyid 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa 'am /
translated: Because when the word is understood, the meaning is understood.

original: mi 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment is either the indication of what is accepted or the indication of what is not accepted.üîΩThere is also the possibility of misunderstanding.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa dag la zhes brjod pas ma nges pa yang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa 'am med par nges pa yin par dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa dag la zhes brjod pas ma nges pa yang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa 'am med par nges pa yin par dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the words ‚Äúin the reason, etc.‚Äù are used, there is the possibility of misunderstanding that the reason, etc. are ascertained as present or absent in similar and dissimilar cases.

original: log par rtogs pa yang yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: log par rtogs pa yang yod pa nyid do //
translated: There is also the possibility of misunderstanding.

original: gang zhig gnyi ga la yod par nges pa de ni thun mong ba yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gnyi ga la yod par nges pa de ni thun mong ba yin te /
translated: That which is ascertained as present in both is common,

original: dper na gzhal bya nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzhal bya nyid bzhin no //
translated: like being an object of comprehension.

original: gang zhig med par nges pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig med par nges pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
translated: That which is ascertained as absent is uncommon,üîΩlike being an object of hearing.

original: dper na mnyan bya bzhin no zhes bya ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na mnyan bya bzhin no zhes bya ba de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: bshad pa / ma nges pa ni phyogs kyi chos nyid yin par nges par bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / ma nges pa ni phyogs kyi chos nyid yin par nges par bya'o //
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: The property of the subject should be ascertained as not contradictory.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ma shes pa'i chos las ni the tshom za bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma shes pa'i chos las ni the tshom za bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because doubt is not suitable with regard to a property that is not known.

original: gang zhig dngos po'i chos mtha' dag khyab pa'i chos gnyis las gcig la yang nges pa med pa de gang du mthong ba der de gnyis la the tshom skyed par byed de /
analyzed: gang zhig dngos po'i chos mtha' dag khyab pa'i chos gnyis las gcig la yang nges pa med pa de gang du mthong ba der de gnyis la the tshom skyed par byed de /
translated: When one sees that a property pervading all things is not ascertained in either of two properties, then one generates doubt with regard to those two.

original: dper na rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag las gcig la nges pa med pa'i mnyan bya nyid sgra la yod pas the tshom skyed kyi /
analyzed: dper na rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag las gcig la nges pa med pa'i mnyan bya nyid sgra la yod pas the tshom skyed kyi /
translated: For example, when audibility, which is not ascertained in either permanent or impermanent things, exists in sound, it generates doubt.

original: med pa'i phyir gzugs la ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir gzugs la ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: But because it does not exist in form, it does not generate doubt.

original: ma nges pa yod pa 'am med pa nyid la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa yod pa 'am med pa nyid la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The existence or nonexistence of the property of the subject is not dependent on that.

original: gal te gzhal bya nyid mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la mthong ba the tshom gyi rgyu yin la /
analyzed: gal te gzhal bya nyid mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la mthong ba the tshom gyi rgyu yin la /
translated: If the mere observation of the object of comprehension in similar and dissimilar instances is the cause of doubt,

original: de bzhin du mnyan par bya @69a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du mnyan par bya @69a * //
translated: then the mere observation of audibility in sound and form would generate doubt.

original: ba nyid rtag pa dang mi rtag ba dag las gcig la yang med par mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: ba nyid rtag pa dang mi rtag ba dag las gcig la yang med par mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: But is it not seen that it does not exist in either a permanent or impermanent sound?

original: de ci ltar yod pa 'am med par nges pa la mi ltos she na /
analyzed: de ci ltar yod pa 'am med par nges pa la mi ltos she na /
translated: How can it be that it does not depend on the ascertainment of existence or nonexistence?

original: nges pa la yang zhes smos so //
analyzed: nges pa la yang zhes smos so //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used because it is not that there is no ascertainment.

original: nges pa med pa nyid do zhes ni mi zer ro //
analyzed: nges pa med pa nyid do zhes ni mi zer ro //
translated: But it is not said that there is no ascertainment.

original: de yod du zin kyang the tshom nyid kyi sgo nas skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de yod du zin kyang the tshom nyid kyi sgo nas skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Even if there were ascertainment, it would be a fault because of doubt.

original: the tshom gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir nges pa la ltos pa ma yin /
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir nges pa la ltos pa ma yin /
translated: It does not depend on ascertainment because it is the cause of doubt.

original: gal te yang gzhal bya nyid mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mthong ba ste /
analyzed: gal te yang gzhal bya nyid mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mthong ba ste /
translated: Even if the object of comprehension is seen in a similar and dissimilar class,

original: de lta na yang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par nges pa'i sgo nas ni sgra la the tshom za ba'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par nges pa'i sgo nas ni sgra la the tshom za ba'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: even so, it is not the cause of doubt about sound by way of ascertaining its existence in a similar and dissimilar class.

original: 'on kyang sgra gcig la 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gnyis mi 'thad ba'i phyir dang / rnam pa gzhan yang mi srid pa'i phyir ci sgra rtag pa la gzhal bya nyid gnas sam /
analyzed: 'on kyang sgra gcig la 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gnyis mi 'thad ba'i phyir dang / rnam pa gzhan yang mi srid pa'i phyir ci sgra rtag pa la gzhal bya nyid gnas sam /
translated: But it is not tenable that a single sound has two contradictory natures, and it is impossible for it to have any other aspect. Therefore, the doubt is whether sound itself is permanent or impermanent.

original: 'on te mi rtag pa la yin zhes chos can nyid la rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du 'jug par dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te mi rtag pa la yin zhes chos can nyid la rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du 'jug par dogs pa yin no //
translated: The doubt is whether the subject itself is permanent or impermanent.

original: chos can la gang yang rung ba yod par dogs pa de ni mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med par ma nges pa la yang mtshungs pa yin no //üîΩmnyan par bya ba nyid kyang snga ma bzhin du ci sgra rtag pa la yin nam /
analyzed: chos can la gang yang rung ba yod par dogs pa de ni mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med par ma nges pa la yang mtshungs pa yin no // mnyan par bya ba nyid kyang snga ma bzhin du ci sgra rtag pa la yin nam /
translated: The doubt is whether the subject exists in some way or other. It is the same as the uncertainty whether what is present in similar and dissimilar cases exists or does not exist.üîΩThe doubt is whether sound is permanent or impermanent.

original: 'on te mi rtag pa la yin zhes the tshom za ba'i phyir the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te mi rtag pa la yin zhes the tshom za ba'i phyir the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs nyid do //
translated: The doubt is whether sound is permanent or impermanent.

original: de'i phyir mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med par the tshom za ba rnam pa de lta bu brjod pa yang ma nges pa brjod par bya ba 'dir sun 'byin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med par the tshom za ba rnam pa de lta bu brjod pa yang ma nges pa brjod par bya ba 'dir sun 'byin pa nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, even the expression of doubt as to whether the reason exists or does not exist in the similar class is a statement of indecision, and here it is a refutation,

original: ma nges pa brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan du gtan tshigs sam 'gal bar bstan par bya ba la ni go rims bzhin du rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i sdug pa ma yin zhing sun 'byin pa yang ma yin te /üîΩgtan tshigs dang 'gal ba'i skabs ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nges pa brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro // gzhan du gtan tshigs sam 'gal bar bstan par bya ba la ni go rims bzhin du rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i sdug pa ma yin zhing sun 'byin pa yang ma yin te / gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba'i skabs ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a statement of indecision.üîΩOtherwise, in the case of a reason or contradiction, it is not a fault of the proponent or respondent, respectively, because the context of the reason or contradiction is not stated.

original: gang gi tshe sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhing skabs kyi sun 'byin pa ma yin zhe na ;
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhing skabs kyi sun 'byin pa ma yin zhe na ;
translated: When it is neither a proof nor a refutation in context,

original: smras pa / yod pa dang med pa gnyi ga la the tshom za ba dper na srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang mnyan bya lta bu 'am /
analyzed: smras pa / yod pa dang med pa gnyi ga la the tshom za ba dper na srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang mnyan bya lta bu 'am /
translated: it is said: Doubt as to both existence and nonexistence, like having life, etc., or being audible,

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa gcig la /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa gcig la /
translated: or existing in only one similar instance,

original: the tshom za ba skyes bu 'ga' zhig ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin te /
analyzed: the tshom za ba skyes bu 'ga' zhig ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin te /
translated: Some people doubt that he is omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the presence of the reason in similar instances.üîΩDoubt about the absence of the reason in dissimilar instances is like this: He is not omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the absence of the reason in dissimilar instances.üîΩDoubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the absence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the absence of the reason.üîΩDoubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason.üîΩDoubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason.üîΩDoubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason.üîΩDoubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,

original: smra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni mthun pa'i @69b phyogs la yod pa la the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: smra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni mthun pa'i @69b phyogs la yod pa la the tshom za ba'o //
translated: because he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa gcig la the tshom za ba ni dper na thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa gcig la the tshom za ba ni dper na thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin te /
translated: Doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason.üîΩDoubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,

original: smra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa la the tshom za ba yin pa bzhin no //üîΩgcig phyin ci log tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ni ma mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ste /
analyzed: smra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa la the tshom za ba yin pa bzhin no // gcig phyin ci log tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ni ma mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ste /
translated: because he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason.

original: dper na gzhal bya bzhin du sgrub pa ma yin la sun 'byin pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na gzhal bya bzhin du sgrub pa ma yin la sun 'byin pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason.üîΩDoubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omniscient,üîΩbecause he speaks. This is doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason.

original: gnyi ga phyin ci log tu gyur na mi 'gal bar 'gyur ba des na gcig ces smos so //
analyzed: gnyi ga phyin ci log tu gyur na mi 'gal bar 'gyur ba des na gcig ces smos so //
translated: Doubt about the pervasion by the contradictory of the presence of the reason is like this: He is not omnis

original: dngos po'i chos mi mthun pa'i phyogs las log pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs la phyin ci log tu gyur par rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos mi mthun pa'i phyogs las log pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs la phyin ci log tu gyur par rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to understand that the opposite of the discordant side is the concordant side.

original: de ni gdon mi za ba gcig la gnas dgos pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par nges pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs la phyin ci log tu sbyar bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gdon mi za ba gcig la gnas dgos pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par nges pa ni mthun pa'i phyogs la phyin ci log tu sbyar bar mi bya'o //
translated: Since it must definitely abide in one of the two, the ascertainment that it does not exist in the discordant side should not be applied to the concordant side.

original: yang ci'i phyir the tshom za ba brjod par sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir the tshom za ba brjod par sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: Why is it that the expression of doubt is not a proof?

original: 'gal ba brjod pa ltar sun 'byin pa yang ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'gal ba brjod pa ltar sun 'byin pa yang ma yin zhe na /
translated: And why is the expression of contradiction not a refutation?

original: bshad pa / nges pa med pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag de lta bu ni nus pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / nges pa med pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag de lta bu ni nus pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: Such a nonascertaining proof is not a valid means of cognition because it is not capable.

original: de'i sgrub pa'i nus pa ni med na mi 'byung bar nges pa nyid yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i sgrub pa'i nus pa ni med na mi 'byung bar nges pa nyid yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: The capacity of that proof is ascertained as the invariable concomitance.

original: thun mong 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad de /
analyzed: thun mong 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad de /
translated: Not only is it common,

original: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa thun mong ma yin pa la yang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la 'jug pa dang ldog pa zhes bya ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa la the tshom za ba
analyzed: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa thun mong ma yin pa la yang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la 'jug pa dang ldog pa zhes bya ba rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa la the tshom za ba
translated: and that which possesses life force and so on, and that which is audible and so on, are not shared in common, then the presence and absence of the property of the subject and the presence and absence of the reason in similar and dissimilar cases are uncertain.

original: nyid kyi phyir the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs nyid do //
analyzed: nyid kyi phyir the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is a reason of uncertainty.

original: ci'i phyir mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la gtan ma mthong ba de dag la the tshom za zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la gtan ma mthong ba de dag la the tshom za zhe na /
translated: Why is there uncertainty about whether that which is audible and so on is seen in only the similar or only the dissimilar classes?

original: bshad pa / gnyi ga las ldog par nges pa ni 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / gnyi ga las ldog par nges pa ni 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that it is ascertained to be absent from both.

original: ci ltar nges pa mi 'thad ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar nges pa mi 'thad ce na /
translated: Why is it not tenable that it is ascertained?

original: bshad pa / gnyi ga las phyi rol tu gyur pa mi srid pas so //
analyzed: bshad pa / gnyi ga las phyi rol tu gyur pa mi srid pas so //
translated: Because it is impossible that it is external to both.

original: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i rnam pa gnyis po de dag gis ni thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir gang la gnas pa na dngos po'i chos gnyi ga las ldog pa nges par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //üîΩdes na de dag la ma mthong yang don @70a * //
analyzed: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i rnam pa gnyis po de dag gis ni thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir gang la gnas pa na dngos po'i chos gnyi ga las ldog pa nges par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no // des na de dag la ma mthong yang don @70a * //
translated: Because all things are included in these two mutually exclusive aspects, there is no other aspect in which one could ascertain the negation of both aspects of a thing.üîΩTherefore, although one does not see the presence of the property of the subject in the example, one should infer that it exists there, because it is necessary that it exist in one of the two.

original: gyis na gcig la gor ma chag par yod dgos so zhes bya ba'i phyir the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gyis na gcig la gor ma chag par yod dgos so zhes bya ba'i phyir the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, we have stated that the reason is inconclusive.

original: gal te de nyid la yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar nges na ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ma nges pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de nyid la yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar nges na ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ma nges pa yin zhe na /
translated: If one ascertains that the property of the subject does not exist in the similar example, how can one ascertain the pervasion?
