analyzed: gzhan ni bsgrub par bya ba khyad par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that another is the object of the probandum.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu ni 'bras bu la 'khrul pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu ni 'bras bu la 'khrul pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the cause is not mistaken with regard to the effect,

original: 'bras bu med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it arises even when the effect does not exist.

original: rgyu ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin pas na 'bras bu ni rgyu la khyab pa ma yin no //üîΩde'i phyir 'bras bu ni mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su ste dbye ba gnyis kyis 'jug go //
analyzed: rgyu ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin pas na 'bras bu ni rgyu la khyab pa ma yin no // de'i phyir 'bras bu ni mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su ste dbye ba gnyis kyis 'jug go //
translated: Since the cause is not necessarily endowed with the effect, the effect does not pervade the cause.üîΩTherefore, the effect is twofold in the similar class.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid du rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pas de'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid du rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pas de'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Since it is twofold in the similar class, it is the effect of that which arises immediately after the effort.

original: ci ltar na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug ce na /
translated: How is it that the cognition of the effect immediately following the operation is present in the similar class in two ways?

original: mi rtag pa yin pa tsam gyis ni zhes smos te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yin pa tsam gyis ni zhes smos te /
translated: It is said: ‚Äúmerely by virtue of being impermanent.‚Äù

original: mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir tsam gyis ni thams cad 'bras bu brtsal ba zhes bya ba skyes bu'i byed pa de'i de ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa'i shes pa rtsom pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir tsam gyis ni thams cad 'bras bu brtsal ba zhes bya ba skyes bu'i byed pa de'i de ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa'i shes pa rtsom pa ma yin te /
translated: Merely by virtue of being impermanent, the cognition of the effect immediately following the operation is not present in all cases of the human operation called ‚Äúseeking.‚Äù

original: rtsom par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsom par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not present in all cases.

original: de'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa byed pa nyid ni mi rtag pa 'ga' zhig la yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa byed pa nyid ni mi rtag pa 'ga' zhig la yod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the cognition of the effect immediately following the operation is present in some impermanent thing.

original: de nyid las kyang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nyid las kyang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid yin no //
translated: And it is also present in that very thing immediately following the operation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa rnam pa gnyis su gnas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de ni mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med pa rnam pa gnyis su gnas so //
translated: For that very reason, it is present in the similar class in two ways, as present and as absent.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa gang yin pa de yul mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci ltar nges pa yin /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa gang yin pa de yul mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba 'di ci ltar nges pa yin /
translated: How do you know that the consciousness that arises immediately after the effort is the effect of the impermanent object?

original: gal te yul nyid rtsom pa la rag las pa yin na ni mi rtag par 'gyur ba yin no /
analyzed: gal te yul nyid rtsom pa la rag las pa yin na ni mi rtag par 'gyur ba yin no /
translated: If the object itself depends on effort, then it would be impermanent.

original: de'i de ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi shes pa nyid rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin gyi yul ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i de ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi shes pa nyid rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin gyi yul ni ma yin no //
translated: The consciousness that arises immediately after the effort is the effect of the effort, not the object.

original: de'i phyir rtsol bas byung ba'i shes pa mi rtag pa ni yul rtag pa'i 'bras bur rung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsol bas byung ba'i shes pa mi rtag pa ni yul rtag pa'i 'bras bur rung ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the impermanent consciousness that arises from effort is suitable to be the effect of a permanent object.

original: 'o na ni bum pha yang rtag pa rtsol bas bskyed pa'i shes pa'i yul yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni bum pha yang rtag pa rtsol bas bskyed pa'i shes pa'i yul yin no zhe na /
translated: But a pot is also the object of a consciousness that arises from effort and is permanent.

original: de ltar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: bum pa na 'grub pa na rtsol ba'i rjes su byed pa'i rang bzhin mngon sum yin pas rtsol ba @76b la mi ltos par grub pa'i shes pas gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: bum pa na 'grub pa na rtsol ba'i rjes su byed pa'i rang bzhin mngon sum yin pas rtsol ba @76b la mi ltos par grub pa'i shes pas gzung ba yin no //
translated: When a pot is produced, it is perceived by a consciousness that is not dependent on effort, because its nature is to be perceived immediately after it is produced.

original: sgra ni rim gyis rtsol ba las skye bar mi mthong gi /
analyzed: sgra ni rim gyis rtsol ba las skye bar mi mthong gi /
translated: But sound is not seen to arise gradually from effort.

original: 'on kyang rtag pa rtsol ba yod na /üîΩrang bzhin yongs su rdzogs par gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtag pa rtsol ba yod na / rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs par gzung ba yin no //
translated: But if sound is permanent, it is apprehended by a cognition that is produced by effort.

original: de'i phyir sgra nyid rtag pa rtsol bas bskyed pa'i shes pas gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa pa'i yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra nyid rtag pa rtsol bas bskyed pa'i shes pas gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa pa'i yin no //
translated: Therefore, sound is permanent and is apprehended by a cognition that is produced by effort.üîΩThis is the view of the Vai≈õe·π£ikas.

original: sgra sngar yod pa de'i shes pa nges par rtsol ba las 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra sngar yod pa de'i shes pa nges par rtsol ba las 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not logical that the cognition of sound, which exists previously, definitely arises from effort.

original: res 'ga' ni 'gyur ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni 'gyur ro //
translated: Sometimes it occurs without effort.

original: de mi rigs pa'i phyir na sngar brjod pa nyid rjes su dpag go //
analyzed: de mi rigs pa'i phyir na sngar brjod pa nyid rjes su dpag go //
translated: Since that is illogical, it is inferred just as it was stated previously.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is this:

original: gal te sgra rtag pa yin na de'i shes pa rtsol ba la ltos par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te sgra rtag pa yin na de'i shes pa rtsol ba la ltos par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If sound is permanent, its cognition would not depend on effort.

original: ci ltar rtag pa'i shes pa rtsol ba la ltos par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rtag pa'i shes pa rtsol ba la ltos par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it that the cognition of a permanent thing does not depend on effort?

original: bshad pa / sgra'i sgrib par byed pa dang dbang po dang sgra ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / sgra'i sgrib par byed pa dang dbang po dang sgra ste /
translated: It is explained: The obscurations of sound, the sense faculty, and sound,

original: de dag la rtsol ba nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir rtag pa'i shes pa ni rtsol ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag la rtsol ba nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir rtag pa'i shes pa ni rtsol ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: because they do not apply effort, the cognition that is permanent is not the effect of effort.

original: yul dang dbang po yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin par rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin par rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: The object and the sense faculty are established as the cause of the cognition through their presence and absence.

original: gal te yul dang dbang po la phan 'dogs sam yul gyi sgrib par byed pa sel ba de lta na ni rtsol ba yang shes pa de'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te yul dang dbang po la phan 'dogs sam yul gyi sgrib par byed pa sel ba de lta na ni rtsol ba yang shes pa de'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If the object and the sense faculty assist or remove the obstruction of the object, then effort would also be the cause of that cognition.

original: yul dang dbang po la phan 'dogs pa ma yin du chug mod /
analyzed: yul dang dbang po la phan 'dogs pa ma yin du chug mod /
translated: Let it be that they do not assist the object and the sense faculty.

original: sgrib pa sel ba ji ltar ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: sgrib pa sel ba ji ltar ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that they do not remove the obstruction?

original: gang gi phyir rtag pa de la dmigs pa'i sgrib par byed pa ni srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtag pa de la dmigs pa'i sgrib par byed pa ni srid pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not possible that there is an obstruction to that which is permanent.

original: ci ltar khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i sgrib pa spangs par nus she na /
analyzed: ci ltar khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i sgrib pa spangs par nus she na /
translated: How can you remove the obstruction that you do not see?

original: bshad pa / kho bos ma mthong ba'i sgrib pa 'ga' zhig yong du chug kyang bsgrib bar bya ba de'i bdag nyid phyin ci log tu ma byas par dngos po las tha mi dad par shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa bzlog par mi nus pa'i phyir mi srid do //
analyzed: bshad pa / kho bos ma mthong ba'i sgrib pa 'ga' zhig yong du chug kyang bsgrib bar bya ba de'i bdag nyid phyin ci log tu ma byas par dngos po las tha mi dad par shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa bzlog par mi nus pa'i phyir mi srid do //
translated: Even if some obscuration that I have not seen were to occur, it is impossible to reverse the capacity to generate the cognition that is not different from the thing to be obscured, without distorting the nature of that thing.

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir dngos po de la khyad par bskyed pa med par ni cung zad byed pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po de la khyad par bskyed pa med par ni cung zad byed pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Because without generating a difference in that thing, it is not the case that something is made to be an obscuration.

original: rtag pa ni khyad par du byar med pa yin pas sgrib pas de la cung zad byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa ni khyad par du byar med pa yin pas sgrib pas de la cung zad byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Since a permanent thing cannot be made different, an obscuration does not make the slightest difference to it.

original: cung zad mi byed pa gang yin pa yang gang gis sgrib par byed pa 'am /
analyzed: cung zad mi byed pa gang yin pa yang gang gis sgrib par byed pa 'am /
translated: And if something does not make the slightest difference, by what is it made an obscuration?

original: khyad par bsgrub pa'i lhan cig byed pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par bsgrub pa'i lhan cig byed pa'o //
translated: Or it is a cooperative condition that establishes a difference.

original: cig shos kyis cung zad mi byed pa yang sgrib par byed par mthong ba bsnyon par nus pa @77a * //
analyzed: cig shos kyis cung zad mi byed pa yang sgrib par byed par mthong ba bsnyon par nus pa @77a * //
translated: It is not possible to deny what is seen, namely, that the other does not make the slightest difference but is still an obscuration.

original: ma yin no snyam nas smras pa /
analyzed: ma yin no snyam nas smras pa /
translated: Thinking this, he said:

original: bzlog pa 'am bsgrubs pa gang gis sgrib par 'gyur ba sgrib par byed pa nyid du grags pa'i rtsig pa la sogs pas bum pa la sogs pa dag la shes pa skyed pa'i nus ba la gegs byed pa'i khyad par ci zhig skyed pa 'am /
analyzed: bzlog pa 'am bsgrubs pa gang gis sgrib par 'gyur ba sgrib par byed pa nyid du grags pa'i rtsig pa la sogs pas bum pa la sogs pa dag la shes pa skyed pa'i nus ba la gegs byed pa'i khyad par ci zhig skyed pa 'am /
translated: What special capacity to generate a consciousness of a pot, etc. is produced in a wall, etc., which is renowned as an obscurer, by the reversal or establishment of obscuration?

original: sngar gnas pa'i shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa'i rang bzhin ci zhig bzlog par byas /
analyzed: sngar gnas pa'i shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa'i rang bzhin ci zhig bzlog par byas /
translated: Or what nature of the capacity to generate a previously existent consciousness is reversed?

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba las cung zad byed par rtogs pa yin na de dag la ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med do //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba las cung zad byed par rtogs pa yin na de dag la ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med do //
translated: If it is understood that they perform a function through positive and negative concomitance, then they do not have positive and negative concomitance.

original: 'on te cung zad mi byed kyang sgrib par 'dod na ni cung zad mi byed pa'i rtag ba la yang 'dod par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te cung zad mi byed kyang sgrib par 'dod na ni cung zad mi byed pa'i rtag ba la yang 'dod par bya'o zhe na /
translated: But if it is maintained that they obscure even though they do not perform a function, then it should be maintained that even permanent things that do not perform a function obscure.

original: bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To reverse that, it is said:

original: de dag ces smos so //
analyzed: de dag ces smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúThose‚Äù is stated.

original: 'o na ji ltar sgrib par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar sgrib par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: Well, how do they obscure?

original: 'on kyang zhes smos te /
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúHowever‚Äù is stated.

original: bum pa'i skad cig thams cad ni thams cad kyi zhes bya ba rtogs pa po'o //
analyzed: bum pa'i skad cig thams cad ni thams cad kyi zhes bya ba rtogs pa po'o //
translated: All the moments of the vase are the cognizer, called ‚Äúall of them.‚Äù

original: phan tshun lhan cig tu gyur pa 'dus pa'i yul dang dbang po dang snang ba dag phan tshun khyad par can gyi skad cig gzhan skyed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: phan tshun lhan cig tu gyur pa 'dus pa'i yul dang dbang po dang snang ba dag phan tshun khyad par can gyi skad cig gzhan skyed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the object, sense faculty, and appearance that are mutually simultaneous and assembled produce another moment that is different from the previous ones,

original: snga ma rang gi ngang gis 'gag pa dbang po'i shes pa'i rgyu skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma rang gi ngang gis 'gag pa dbang po'i shes pa'i rgyu skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the previous one ceases by its own power and the cause of the arising of the sense consciousness arises.

original: phan tshun khyad par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: phan tshun khyad par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is it called ‚Äúmutually different‚Äù?

original: dbang po dang snang bas phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'i yul ni de gnyis la ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po dang snang bas phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'i yul ni de gnyis la ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not suitable for an object that is not to be benefited by the sense faculty and appearance to rely on those two.

original: de bzhin du gnyis po dag kyang gnyis dag gis phan gdags par bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis po dag kyang gnyis dag gis phan gdags par bya ba ma yin na /
translated: Similarly, the two are not to be benefited by the two,

original: de dag la ltos par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la ltos par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not suitable for them to rely on those two.

original: phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa ni phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa la ltos pa ma yin no//
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa ni phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa la ltos pa ma yin no//
translated: That which is not to be benefited is not to be relied on by that which does not benefit.

original: sa bon la sogs pa'i khyad par dang po skyed pa'i nus pa nye bar 'tshog pa'i rgyu nyid las skyes pa'i phyir phan tshun khyad par ltos pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa'i khyad par dang po skyed pa'i nus pa nye bar 'tshog pa'i rgyu nyid las skyes pa'i phyir phan tshun khyad par ltos pa med pa yin la /
translated: Because it arises from the cause of the collection of the potential to generate the first difference, such as the seed, etc., the differences are not mutually independent.

original: 'ba' zhig pa rnams kyang byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa rnams kyang byed pa ma yin no //
translated: And the single ones are not the agent.

original: de bzhin du mig la sogs pa rnams phan tshun phan gdags par bya ba ma yin yang 'ba' zhig byed pa ma yin pas ltos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mig la sogs pa rnams phan tshun phan gdags par bya ba ma yin yang 'ba' zhig byed pa ma yin pas ltos par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, although the eye, etc., are not mutually the object to be benefited, they are dependent because they are not the single agent.

original: de skad du gtan tshigs thigs pa las 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis po lhan cig byed pas khyad par bskyed pa las skye ba dang cig shos zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du gtan tshigs thigs pa las 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis po lhan cig byed pas khyad par bskyed pa las skye ba dang cig shos zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus, in the Tattva·π≠ƒ´kƒÅ, it says, ‚ÄúThe effect arises from the generation of the difference by the collection of the causes, and the other.‚Äù

original: de la khyad par dang po dang mig gi rnam par shes @77b pa gang zhig ni lhan cig byed pa dag gis khyad par ma bskyed pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin la /
analyzed: de la khyad par dang po dang mig gi rnam par shes @77b pa gang zhig ni lhan cig byed pa dag gis khyad par ma bskyed pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin la /
translated: In that regard, the first difference and the eye consciousness arise from the cause that is not the generation of the difference by the collection of the causes.

original: skad cig gnyis pa la sogs par 'byung pa'i khyad par myu gu dang bcas pa dang snang ba nas mun par zhugs pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa ni lhan cig byed pa dag gis khyad par bskyed pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni yin no zhe na /
analyzed: skad cig gnyis pa la sogs par 'byung pa'i khyad par myu gu dang bcas pa dang snang ba nas mun par zhugs pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa ni lhan cig byed pa dag gis khyad par bskyed pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni yin no zhe na /
translated: The difference that arises in the second moment and so on is that it is accompanied by the sprout, and the eye consciousness that sees the light and then enters darkness arises from a cause that generates a difference through its coemergent conditions.

original: bden mod kyi 'on kyang tshogs pa yul gang na gnas pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i yul de nyid na gnas pa'i tshogs pa rgyu yin no //
analyzed: bden mod kyi 'on kyang tshogs pa yul gang na gnas pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i yul de nyid na gnas pa'i tshogs pa rgyu yin no //
translated: Although this is true, the collection that produces the effect while abiding in a certain place is the cause that abides in that very place.

original: de dag gi rgyu res 'ga' ba nyid ni rang gi rgyud tsam las 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi rgyu res 'ga' ba nyid ni rang gi rgyud tsam las 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: The occasional cause of those does not arise from its own continuum alone,

original: rgyud des ni sngar yang yod pa'i phyir rgyur thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyud des ni sngar yang yod pa'i phyir rgyur thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because it would follow that the continuum itself would be the cause, since it existed previously.

original: sngar gyi skad cig kyang gzhan yin la phyis kyi skad cig kyang gzhan yin pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig la lar nus pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sngar gyi skad cig kyang gzhan yin la phyis kyi skad cig kyang gzhan yin pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig la lar nus pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Since the previous moment is different and the later moment is also different, it is capable of anything anywhere.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: skad cig tha dad kyang rgyud gzhan du gyur pa'i 'bras bu tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig tha dad kyang rgyud gzhan du gyur pa'i 'bras bu tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect is not different even though the moments are different.

original: gang zhig tha dad kyang gang tha mi dad pa de ni de la rag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig tha dad kyang gang tha mi dad pa de ni de la rag pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is different is not dependent on that which is not different.

original: dper na sa bon tha dad kyang du ba tha mi dad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa bon tha dad kyang du ba tha mi dad pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, even though the seeds are different, the smoke is not different.

original: de bzhin du 'bras bu yang skad cig tha dad kyang tha mi dad pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'bras bu yang skad cig tha dad kyang tha mi dad pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, even though the effect is different in each moment, it is not different.

original: mig gi skad cig tha dad kyang 'bras bu mig gi rnam par mtshungs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig gi skad cig tha dad kyang 'bras bu mig gi rnam par mtshungs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the eye is seen to have a similar effect, even though the moments of the eye are different.

original: des na rgyud tha dad pa mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu byed pa nyid res 'ga' ba ni rgyud gzhan gyis sad par byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na rgyud tha dad pa mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu byed pa nyid res 'ga' ba ni rgyud gzhan gyis sad par byas pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the occasional production of an effect that is similar for different continua is due to being activated by another continuum.

original: gnas skabs gang gi 'bras bu byed pa nyid kyi nus pa sad pa'i rgyu ni gnas skabs de 'thob pa'i rgyu'i rgyud gzhan yin no //
analyzed: gnas skabs gang gi 'bras bu byed pa nyid kyi nus pa sad pa'i rgyu ni gnas skabs de 'thob pa'i rgyu'i rgyud gzhan yin no //
translated: The cause that activates the potency to produce an effect in a particular state is another continuum that is the cause for attaining that state.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu gang zhig tshogs pa tsam na rtsom pa'i 'bras bu de'i nus pa sad par byed pa ni phan tshun 'tshog pa'i rgyur yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu gang zhig tshogs pa tsam na rtsom pa'i 'bras bu de'i nus pa sad par byed pa ni phan tshun 'tshog pa'i rgyur yin la /
translated: Therefore, the cause of the mutual collection of the collection of causes and conditions is the awakening of the potency of the effect that is begun when the collection is complete.

original: 'bras bu gang zhig tshogs kyang dus cung zad cig 'bras bu rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las brtags par bya pa'i rgyu dag gis ma byas pa na rgyu gzhan kho na sad par bya ba yin no //üîΩji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las brtag par bya ba de bzhin du 'bras bu'i nus pa sad pa'i rgyu yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag kho nas rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu gang zhig tshogs kyang dus cung zad cig 'bras bu rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las brtags par bya pa'i rgyu dag gis ma byas pa na rgyu gzhan kho na sad par bya ba yin no // ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las brtag par bya ba de bzhin du 'bras bu'i nus pa sad pa'i rgyu yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag kho nas rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: But if the effect is not produced by causes that are to be inferred from the presence and absence of the effect, then another cause alone awakens the potency of the effect.üîΩJust as the cause is to be inferred from the presence and absence of the effect, in the same way, the cause that awakens the potency of the effect is also to be understood from the presence and absence of the effect.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las brtag par bya ba de bzhin du 'bras bu'i nus pa sad @78a * //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las brtag par bya ba de bzhin du 'bras bu'i nus pa sad @78a * //
translated: Just as the cause is to be inferred from the presence and absence of the effect, in the same way, the cause that awakens the potency of the effect is also to be understood from the presence and absence of the effect.

original: pa'i rgyu yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag kho nas rtogs par bya ba yin /
analyzed: pa'i rgyu yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag kho nas rtogs par bya ba yin /
translated: The cause of that is also to be understood only through concomitance and reversal.

original: rgyu gzhan yang ma mthong ste /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan yang ma mthong ste /
translated: And no other cause is seen.

original: de'i phyir skyed par byed pa de dag nyid phan tshun 'bras bu'i nus pa sad par nus pa yin par rjes su dpag go //
analyzed: de'i phyir skyed par byed pa de dag nyid phan tshun 'bras bu'i nus pa sad par nus pa yin par rjes su dpag go //
translated: Therefore, we infer that those very producers are able to activate each other's potency to produce effects.

original: ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gnas skabs gang las 'bras bu skye ba'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du rgyu gnyis sad pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'i gnas skabs de nyid phan tshun sad par byed nus pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gnas skabs gang las 'bras bu skye ba'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du rgyu gnyis sad pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'i gnas skabs de nyid phan tshun sad par byed nus pa yin no //
translated: Just as from concomitance and reversal, the state from which an effect arises is the cause, in the same way, the state in which the two causes are activated is the state in which they are able to activate each other.

original: des na thag ring bo na gnas pa dag ni phan tshun nus pa sad par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na thag ring bo na gnas pa dag ni phan tshun nus pa sad par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, those that exist far away do not activate each other,

original: de'i tshe rgyu nyid sad pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / ma sad pa yang 'bras bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyu nyid sad pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / ma sad pa yang 'bras bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time, the activation of the cause itself is seen, and the non-activation is not seen as having an effect.

original: des na kha cig na re thag ring bo na gnas pa dag kyang phan gdags par bya ba rang /
analyzed: des na kha cig na re thag ring bo na gnas pa dag kyang phan gdags par bya ba rang /
translated: Thus, the objection that you have raised against us, namely, ‚ÄúHow can a thing that is momentary be helpful to another thing that is momentary?‚Äù

original: phan 'dogs par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa de bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa de bsal ba yin no //
translated: is not relevant to our position.

original: gal te skad cig tha dad pa las tha dad par mi 'gyur na ci ltar sa bon la sogs pa nye ba tsam gyis myu gu mi skyed ce na /
analyzed: gal te skad cig tha dad pa las tha dad par mi 'gyur na ci ltar sa bon la sogs pa nye ba tsam gyis myu gu mi skyed ce na /
translated: If a thing does not differ from a different thing, then why does a sprout not arise merely through the presence of a seed?

original: 'di ni cung zad ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gyis byas pa'i khyad par brgyud pa las rkyen pa yin no zhes brjod pas bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni cung zad ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gyis byas pa'i khyad par brgyud pa las rkyen pa yin no zhes brjod pas bsal ba yin no //
translated: This objection is answered by the statement, ‚ÄúIt is due to the difference that is produced by the immediately preceding condition.‚Äù

original: ci ltar cig car rgyud gzhan khyad par du byed par mi nus pa de ltar rang gi rgyu kho na las rgyud gzhan skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar cig car rgyud gzhan khyad par du byed par mi nus pa de ltar rang gi rgyu kho na las rgyud gzhan skyes pa yin te /
translated: Just as a thing is not able to produce a different continuum simultaneously, in the same way, a thing produces a different continuum only from its own cause.

original: des na rim gyis khyad par du byed do //
analyzed: des na rim gyis khyad par du byed do //
translated: Thus, it produces a difference gradually.

original: byi ba'i sos zin pa ni dngos po nus pa yin te /
analyzed: byi ba'i sos zin pa ni dngos po nus pa yin te /
translated: The thing that is capable of producing a different continuum is a real entity.

original: yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos nas rgyud gzhan la khyad par sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yongs su 'gyur ba la ltos nas rgyud gzhan la khyad par sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that the other continuum is established as different in dependence on the transformation.

original: rang gi rgyud ni skad cig tha dad kyang 'bras bu tha dad pa med pa'i phyir nam yang sad par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud ni skad cig tha dad kyang 'bras bu tha dad pa med pa'i phyir nam yang sad par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: And one‚Äôs own continuum is not a cause of awakening at any time, because it is different in every moment, and the effect is not different.

original: de la snang ba nas mun par zhugs pa la phan tshun khyad par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dir phan tshun ltos pa yod pa yin pas na phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa ltos par mi rung ba'i phyir zhes bshad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de la snang ba nas mun par zhugs pa la phan tshun khyad par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dir phan tshun ltos pa yod pa yin pas na phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa ltos par mi rung ba'i phyir zhes bshad pa yin gyi /
translated: In that case, when one enters from light into darkness, the mutual establishment of the difference is here the existence of mutual dependence, and since it is not suitable for the nonbenefited to be dependent, it is explained that it is not suitable for the nonbenefited to be dependent.

original: thams cad kyi tshe ltos pa yod pa ni ma yin pas 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe ltos pa yod pa ni ma yin pas 'gal ba med do //
translated: But since it is not the case that dependence exists at all times, there is no contradiction.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: If that were not so,

original: gal te phan tshun khyad par mi skyed na nus pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu dang 'brel pa'i nus pa nye ba'i gnas skabs na rgyu khyad par med pas nus pa khyad par med pa'i phyir rtag tu skyed pa 'am /
analyzed: gal te phan tshun khyad par mi skyed na nus pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu dang 'brel pa'i nus pa nye ba'i gnas skabs na rgyu khyad par med pas nus pa khyad par med pa'i phyir rtag tu skyed pa 'am /
translated: If they do not generate each other, then since the cause is not different when the potential that is the cause of their mutual approach is near, the potential would not be different. Therefore it would always generate them.

original: mi skyed par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: mi skyed par 'gyur ro//
translated: If they do not generate a difference in each other, then since the cause is not different when the capacity that is the cause of their mutual approach is present, the capacity would not be different. Therefore, it would always generate or it would never generate.

original: @78b gal te phan tshun phan pa byed pa yin na thams cad kyi tshe phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @78b gal te phan tshun phan pa byed pa yin na thams cad kyi tshe phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they mutually benefit each other, they would always benefit.

original: des na des phan gdags pa'i phyir thams cad kyi tshe shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des na des phan gdags pa'i phyir thams cad kyi tshe shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, in order for them to benefit, consciousness would always arise.

original: bshad pa / yul dang dbang po dang snang ba de dag kyang mthong ba'i gegs byed pa thogs pa byed pa bar na 'dug pa gzhan gyis bar du mchod na phan tshun phan 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / yul dang dbang po dang snang ba de dag kyang mthong ba'i gegs byed pa thogs pa byed pa bar na 'dug pa gzhan gyis bar du mchod na phan tshun phan 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: But if the object, sense faculty, and appearance are not obstructed by something that obstructs seeing, and if they are not obstructed by something else that is situated between them, they mutually benefit each other.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bshad pa / yul gang du dbang po dang snang ba dang yul rnams kyi bar chad med pa de ni bar du ma chod pa'i yul yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / yul gang du dbang po dang snang ba dang yul rnams kyi bar chad med pa de ni bar du ma chod pa'i yul yin te /
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: An object is an unobstructed object when there is no obstruction of the object, the sense faculty, and the appearance of the object.

original: de'i rung ba de nyid gad dag gi lhan cig byed pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rung ba de nyid gad dag gi lhan cig byed pa yin pa'o //
translated: That which is suitable for it is the cooperative condition of that.

original: gang gi phyir de dag phan tshun phan 'dogs pa na lhan cig byed pa mchod pa'i yul la ltos pa de'i phyir bar du chod pa dag phan tshun phan 'dogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag phan tshun phan 'dogs pa na lhan cig byed pa mchod pa'i yul la ltos pa de'i phyir bar du chod pa dag phan tshun phan 'dogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Because when they mutually assist each other, they are the cooperative conditions of the object that is observed, therefore obstructed objects do not mutually assist each other.

original: ci ltar dus kyi mthar phyin pa la ltos pa'i tshogs pa yul chod pa med pa dag las 'bras bu skye bar mthong ba'i phyir tshogs pa yul chod pa med pa byed pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu dag nus pa byed pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ci ltar dus kyi mthar phyin pa la ltos pa'i tshogs pa yul chod pa med pa dag las 'bras bu skye bar mthong ba'i phyir tshogs pa yul chod pa med pa byed pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu dag nus pa byed pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Because the arising of an effect is seen from an unobstructed collection of causes and conditions that depend on the end of time, therefore unobstructed collections of causes and conditions that are active cooperative conditions are able to perform their function.

original: yul chod pa med pa'i tshogs pa tsam las 'bras bu skye bar mthong ba'i phyir phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu dag kyang tshogs pa yul chod pa med par byed pa dag nus pa'i rgyu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul chod pa med pa'i tshogs pa tsam las 'bras bu skye bar mthong ba'i phyir phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu dag kyang tshogs pa yul chod pa med par byed pa dag nus pa'i rgyu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Because we see that effects arise from a mere collection that is not obstructed, mutually approaching causes that are not obstructed are the efficient cause.

original: de lta yin dang bar chod med na rgyu'i dngos po yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang bar chod med na rgyu'i dngos po yin no //
translated: If that were so, then if there is no obstruction, it would be a cause.

original: yul chod pa med pa'i tshogs pa rnams kyis rgyu gang ji snyad pa de'i nus pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: yul chod pa med pa'i tshogs pa rnams kyis rgyu gang ji snyad pa de'i nus pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: Whatever is a cause of a collection that is not obstructed is its efficient cause,

original: de dag nyid nus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag nyid nus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those are its power.

original: bar chod yod na ni 'bras bu mi skyed pa'i phyir rgyu med pas nus pa'i rgyu med pa yin no //
analyzed: bar chod yod na ni 'bras bu mi skyed pa'i phyir rgyu med pas nus pa'i rgyu med pa yin no //
translated: If there is obstruction, it does not generate an effect, and therefore it is not a cause.

original: ji ltar bar med pa'i dus gzhan nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu 'am /
analyzed: ji ltar bar med pa'i dus gzhan nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu 'am /
translated: If there is no obstruction, how could it be a cause?üîΩJust as a different moment of power arises from mutually approaching causes or from coemergent causes that are not obstructed,

original: lhan cig byed pa dag las nus pa'i skad cig gzhan skye ba de bzhin du chod pa'i dus na de dag las nus pa ma skyes pa yin la /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa dag las nus pa'i skad cig gzhan skye ba de bzhin du chod pa'i dus na de dag las nus pa ma skyes pa yin la /
translated: in the same way, power does not arise from them when there is obstruction.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir shes pa mi skye ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir shes pa mi skye ba yin gyi /
translated: Because the object does not arise, consciousness does not arise.

original: rtsig pa la sogs pas yul la khyad par byas pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsig pa la sogs pas yul la khyad par byas pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not because of a difference in the object due to a wall, etc.

original: gal te de lta na dang po nas bsgrubs pa'i bum pa la sogs pa dag la rgyu med pa'i phyir shes pa mi skye ba yin du chug mod /üîΩdngos po mthong ba na shes pa skyed pa'i rgyu dag la sgrib pa bzhugs na sgrib pa ma yin na ci ste /
analyzed: gal te de lta na dang po nas bsgrubs pa'i bum pa la sogs pa dag la rgyu med pa'i phyir shes pa mi skye ba yin du chug mod / dngos po mthong ba na shes pa skyed pa'i rgyu dag la sgrib pa bzhugs na sgrib pa ma yin na ci ste /
translated: If that is so, then it is acceptable that consciousness does not arise in a pot, etc., because it is not produced in the first place, and because it has no cause.

original: shes pa mi skye zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa mi skye zhe na /
translated: But when a thing is seen, if the causes of the arising of consciousness are obstructed, then it is an obstruction. Why does consciousness not arise?

original: bshad pa / rgyu ma tshang bas shes pa mi skye ba yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / rgyu ma tshang bas shes pa mi skye ba yin no //
translated: We reply: Consciousness does not arise because its causes are incomplete.

original: @79a * // ci'i phyir rgyu mtshan zhe na /
analyzed: @79a * // ci'i phyir rgyu mtshan zhe na /
translated: Why are the causes incomplete?

original: bar chad zhugs na zhes bya ba ni bar chod yod pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: bar chad zhugs na zhes bya ba ni bar chod yod pa'i dus na'o //
translated: When there is an obstruction means when there is an obstruction.

original: bar chad nye bas sngar skyes pa'i nus pa 'gags pa'i phyir dang / sngar 'gags pa las skye bar 'dod pa shes pa'i rgyu'i nus pa gzhan yang ma skyes pa'i phyir rgyu ma tshang ba yin no ;
analyzed: bar chad nye bas sngar skyes pa'i nus pa 'gags pa'i phyir dang / sngar 'gags pa las skye bar 'dod pa shes pa'i rgyu'i nus pa gzhan yang ma skyes pa'i phyir rgyu ma tshang ba yin no ;
translated: Because the potential that was previously produced is obstructed by the near-obstacle, and because another potential that is the cause of consciousness is not produced from what has already ceased, the cause is incomplete.

original: yul chod pa dang bcas pa'i skad cig ji snyed pa de thams cad ni nus pa med pa nyid do snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: yul chod pa dang bcas pa'i skad cig ji snyed pa de thams cad ni nus pa med pa nyid do snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: It is thought that all moments that are obstructed by an object are indeed without potential.

original: ji zhig tu gyur pas ma skyes na /
analyzed: ji zhig tu gyur pas ma skyes na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat is it that is not produced?‚Äù

original: rgyu med pas so //
analyzed: rgyu med pas so //
translated: It is because it is without cause.

original: gang gi phyir skad cig snga ma shes pa skye bar nus pa yin yang shes pa skyed par nus pa'i skad cig gzhan gyi rgyu ma yin pa de'i phyir rgyu med pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skad cig snga ma shes pa skye bar nus pa yin yang shes pa skyed par nus pa'i skad cig gzhan gyi rgyu ma yin pa de'i phyir rgyu med pa yin no //
translated: Because the previous moment of consciousness is able to produce consciousness, it is not the cause of another moment that is able to produce consciousness. Therefore, it is without cause.

original: 'di ltar dper na /
analyzed: 'di ltar dper na /
translated: For example,

original: skad cig dang po la lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'am /
analyzed: skad cig dang po la lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'am /
translated: in the first moment, it is a co-originating cause or

original: phan tshun ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi ro bo las 'pho bar bya nus pa ma kho na nus pa'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa yang yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi ro bo las 'pho bar bya nus pa ma kho na nus pa'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa yang yin no //
translated: Just as the second moment and so on are the enabling cause of the second moment and so on, so too the first moment is the enabling cause of the second moment and so on.

original: skad cig bar chad dang bcas par gyur na ni dbang po la sogs pa bar du chod pa skyed pa'i phyir snang ba nas mun par zhugs pa 'am /üîΩgzhan gyi sngar gyi lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i skad cig gam /
analyzed: skad cig bar chad dang bcas par gyur na ni dbang po la sogs pa bar du chod pa skyed pa'i phyir snang ba nas mun par zhugs pa 'am / gzhan gyi sngar gyi lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'i skad cig gam /
translated: If the first moment is interrupted, then the second moment is not generated because the sense faculty and so on is obstructed.üîΩOr the first moment of the other is not the enabling cause of the second moment of the other.

original: phan tshun nye bar 'gro bar byed pa'i skad cig dag nus pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun nye bar 'gro bar byed pa'i skad cig dag nus pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: Or the first moment of the other is not the enabling cause of the second moment of the other.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: skad cig bar chad dang ldan pa yin na snga ma rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyu ma skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: skad cig bar chad dang ldan pa yin na snga ma rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyu ma skyes pa yin te /
translated: If the first moment is interrupted, then the cause of consciousness is not generated because the prior cause does not exist.

original: des na snga ma 'gags pa'i phyir yang rgyu ma tshang ba yin la /
analyzed: des na snga ma 'gags pa'i phyir yang rgyu ma tshang ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, because the prior cause ceases, the cause is incomplete.

original: des na shes pa ma skyes pa yin gyi rang gi rgyu las skyes pa'i rung ba'i gegs sgrib pas byas pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na shes pa ma skyes pa yin gyi rang gi rgyu las skyes pa'i rung ba'i gegs sgrib pas byas pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, consciousness is not produced, but it is not because of an obstruction that prevents its production from its own cause.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rung ba de ni rang gi ngo bo las mi 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rung ba de ni rang gi ngo bo las mi 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is possible does not change its nature.

original: rung ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi ro bo las 'pho bar bya nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rung ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi ro bo las 'pho bar bya nus pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is possible cannot be made to change its nature.

original: des na rgyu med pas shes pa ma skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu med pas shes pa ma skyes pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, consciousness is not produced without a cause.

original: de'i phyir rtsig pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la cung zad byed par 'gyur ba na sgrib pas byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsig pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la cung zad byed par 'gyur ba na sgrib pas byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, when something is produced in some place, such as a wall, it is not because of an obstruction.

original: 'on kyang de dag yod na rgyu ma tshang bas gang zhig ma dmigs pa de'i dmigs pa'i gegs su sgro btags nas sgrib par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag yod na rgyu ma tshang bas gang zhig ma dmigs pa de'i dmigs pa'i gegs su sgro btags nas sgrib par brjod pa yin no //
translated: However, when it is not produced, it is imputed to be an obstruction because of the non-perception of that which is possible due to the incompleteness of the cause.

original: de ltar sgrib pa cung zad byed pa ma yin yang dmigs pa'i gegs kyi rgyu nyid du sgro btags nas bsgrib par bya ba dang 'brel bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sgrib pa cung zad byed pa ma yin yang dmigs pa'i gegs kyi rgyu nyid du sgro btags nas bsgrib par bya ba dang 'brel bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan nas /
translated: Thus, even though it does not obscure in the slightest, it is figuratively designated as an obscuration because it is the cause of the impediment to the object.

original: @79b da ni sgrib pa cung zad byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir yang na zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: @79b da ni sgrib pa cung zad byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir yang na zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that it does obscure in the slightest, he says: or else.

original: phyogs nyid smras pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs nyid smras pa ni /
translated: The position itself is stated:

original: srid pa yang yin te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: srid pa yang yin te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: it is possible.

original: skad cig ma rnams ni phan tshun phan par byed par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: skad cig ma rnams ni phan tshun phan par byed par 'gyur gyi /
translated: The moments assist each other,

original: skad cig ma yin pa bstan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma yin pa bstan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: but not those which are taught to be of a single nature.

original: dbang po dang yul dag las shin tu bstan par gnas pa'i sgrib pa ci ltar de dag las phan 'dogs par nus she na /
analyzed: dbang po dang yul dag las shin tu bstan par gnas pa'i sgrib pa ci ltar de dag las phan 'dogs par nus she na /
translated: How can the obscuration which is situated in the sense faculty and the object be capable of assisting them, since it is not in contact with them?

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
translated: Because it is inconceivable.

original: ring po na 'dug pa de ji ltar yul la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin zhes bya ba de ltar ni bsam par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ring po na 'dug pa de ji ltar yul la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin zhes bya ba de ltar ni bsam par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: How can something that is far away benefit a place?

original: khang long thag ring po na 'dug pas kyang lcags 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khang long thag ring po na 'dug pas kyang lcags 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not something that can be imagined, because even though the space is far away, it draws the iron to it.

original: rgyu ni nye bar len pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni nye bar len pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Cause means substantial cause.

original: rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Condition means cooperative cause.

original: gang gi rgyun gang log pas gang skye ba dang / lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen thams cad kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid gang la skye ba de ni nye bar len pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi rgyun gang log pas gang skye ba dang / lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen thams cad kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid gang la skye ba de ni nye bar len pa yin la /
translated: That which is produced by the cessation of the continuum of something and by the special result that is established by all the cooperative conditions is substantial cause.

original: gzhan ni rkyen yin no zhes /
analyzed: gzhan ni rkyen yin no zhes /
translated: The others are conditions.

original: de dang de min rang bzhin dngos //
analyzed: de dang de min rang bzhin dngos //
translated: The nature of that which is not that is an entity.

original: zhes bya ba der dpyad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba der dpyad zin to //
translated: This has been analyzed in the Abhidharma.

original: gal te thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa bsam gyis mi khyab kyang thams cad mkhyen pas ni rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mdzad pa bsam par spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa bsam gyis mi khyab kyang thams cad mkhyen pas ni rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mdzad pa bsam par spyod pa yin no //
translated: But if the omniscient one is omniscient, then the entire classification of things is directly perceived by the omniscient one.

original: 'di tsam zhig brjod par nus te /
analyzed: 'di tsam zhig brjod par nus te /
translated: This much can be said:

original: gang zhig rang gi ngo bo tsam mam khyad par thob pa la gang zhig gi yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa de ni de'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig rang gi ngo bo tsam mam khyad par thob pa la gang zhig gi yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa de ni de'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Whatever is concomitant with the existence or nonexistence of something, whether it be the mere nature of that thing or something that is obtained as a distinguishing feature, is the cause of that thing.

original: de lta yin dang thag ring po na gnas pa yang rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin dang thag ring po na gnas pa yang rgyu yin no //
translated: If that is so, then even something that is distant is a cause.

original: des na dbang po dang yul dag gi bar na gnas pa'i sgrib pa gang yin pa des so //
analyzed: des na dbang po dang yul dag gi bar na gnas pa'i sgrib pa gang yin pa des so //
translated: Therefore, whatever is an obstruction between the sense faculty and the object is the obstruction.

original: rnam par shes pa skyed pa dang mi mthun pa ni nus pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skyed pa dang mi mthun pa ni nus pa med pa'o //
translated: That which is not conducive to the arising of consciousness is ineffective.

original: ches cher gyi sgra ni rab tu 'gyur ba brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ches cher gyi sgra ni rab tu 'gyur ba brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúvery‚Äù expresses a high degree.

original: de'i ngo bo ni ches cher te rab tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni ches cher te rab tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Its nature is very high, that is, very high degree.

original: rab tu gyur pa des yul dang dbang po de gnyis la khyad par byed pa yang yin no //
analyzed: rab tu gyur pa des yul dang dbang po de gnyis la khyad par byed pa yang yin no //
translated: and this transformation causes a difference in the object and the sense faculty.

original: nus pa med par rab tu byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nus pa med par rab tu byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said that the sense faculty is capable of producing a cognition that is obstructed.

original: skyes bu dbang po bsgribs pa nyid kyi yul lam dbang po'i shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa sgrib pas nyams par byed kyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu dbang po bsgribs pa nyid kyi yul lam dbang po'i shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa sgrib pas nyams par byed kyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: The sense faculty of a person who is obstructed is capable of producing a cognition of an object or a sense faculty, but its capacity is impaired by the obstruction.

original: des na dbang po ma bsgribs pas ni yul de nyid @80a * //
analyzed: des na dbang po ma bsgribs pas ni yul de nyid @80a * //
translated: Therefore, since the sense faculty is not obstructed, the object

original: mthong ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bar na gnas pa zhes smos so //üîΩbsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyis na gang gis skad cig dang po la rdzas kyi sgrib pa skyed par byed pa'i sgrib pa'i rkyen nam /
analyzed: mthong ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bar na gnas pa zhes smos so // bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyis na gang gis skad cig dang po la rdzas kyi sgrib pa skyed par byed pa'i sgrib pa'i rkyen nam /
translated: is seen. In order to demonstrate this, it says, ‚Äúthat which is situated in between.‚ÄùüîΩSince it is inconceivable, the obstruction that produces the obstruction of the substance in the first moment,

original: nye bar len pa sgrib pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i rten de nyid kyis bsgribs pa'i rdzas de rang gi shes pa skyed mi nus par skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: nye bar len pa sgrib pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i rten de nyid kyis bsgribs pa'i rdzas de rang gi shes pa skyed mi nus par skyed pa yin no //
translated: or the appropriation that is the support for the obstruction that is appropriated, obstructs that very substance that is obstructed, and it is produced as incapable of producing its own cognition.

original: gang gi phyir sgrib pa de nye bas kyang skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa'i shes ba skyed pa'i nus pa nyams pa'i rdzas skyed pa dang / rang gi rgyun du gtogs pa sgrib pa'i rdzas nye bar len pa de bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba'i rkyen dang sgrib pa'i nye bar len pa'i nus pa yang de 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgrib pa de nye bas kyang skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa'i shes ba skyed pa'i nus pa nyams pa'i rdzas skyed pa dang / rang gi rgyun du gtogs pa sgrib pa'i rdzas nye bar len pa de bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba'i rkyen dang sgrib pa'i nye bar len pa'i nus pa yang de 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: In the same way, the potency of the condition that is the appropriator of the obscuration is also like that.

original: des na gal te sgrib pas rdzas de nus pa med par bya ba yin na skad cig gang la sgrib pa de nye pa'i skad cig de la rang gi rgyus bskyed pa'i rdzas kyis nus pa'i gegs ma yin pa'i phyir skad cig gcig la chod pa yang mthongüîΩbar 'gyur ro //üîΩha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir mi nye ba nyid ni sgrib pa ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gal te sgrib pas rdzas de nus pa med par bya ba yin na skad cig gang la sgrib pa de nye pa'i skad cig de la rang gi rgyus bskyed pa'i rdzas kyis nus pa'i gegs ma yin pa'i phyir skad cig gcig la chod pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro // ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir mi nye ba nyid ni sgrib pa ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de spangs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, if the obscuration renders that substance impotent, then in whatever moment the obscuration is proximate, the substance generated by its cause is not impeded by potency, and thus it is seen to be obstructed by a single moment.üîΩThe assertion that nonproximity is not obscuration because it is absurd is refuted by this.

original: 'di ltar mi nye ba'i sgrib pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar mi nye ba'i sgrib pa ma yin la /
translated: Because nonproximity is not obscuration,

original: bsgribs pa la mthong ba yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgribs pa la mthong ba yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not that there is seeing of the obscured.

original: ches cher zhes smos pa ni don 'di bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: ches cher zhes smos pa ni don 'di bstan pa yin te /
translated: The expression ‚Äúvery much‚Äù indicates this meaning.

original: dang po ni sgrib pa'i rgyus kyang don nus pa med par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: dang po ni sgrib pa'i rgyus kyang don nus pa med par byed pa yin la /
translated: The first moment is that which makes the object ineffective due to the cause of obscuration.

original: skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa ni sgrib pa des khyad par sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa ni sgrib pa des khyad par sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The second moment and so on are that which establishes a difference through that obscuration.

original: 'di snyam du sgrib pa'i mi mthun pa sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rtogs par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sgrib pa'i mi mthun pa sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rtogs par bya ba yin na /
translated: If one thinks in this way, the capacity to establish the opposite of obscuration is to be understood from positive and negative concomitance.

original: 'dir ni de gnyis yod pa ma yin no snyam pa la /
analyzed: 'dir ni de gnyis yod pa ma yin no snyam pa la /
translated: But here, those two do not exist.

original: sgrib pa'i bye brag gis zhes smos te /
analyzed: sgrib pa'i bye brag gis zhes smos te /
translated: The expression ‚Äúdue to the difference in obscuration‚Äù is stated.

original: sgra 'dzin pa la ni re lde dang snam bu dang rtsig pa la sogs pa sgrib pa'i bye brag yin no //
analyzed: sgra 'dzin pa la ni re lde dang snam bu dang rtsig pa la sogs pa sgrib pa'i bye brag yin no //
translated: For the apprehension of sound, the difference in obscuration is a fence, a cloth, a wall, and so on.

original: reg pa dang dri 'dzin pa la ni ras srab mo dang / gos nyis bltab tu byas pa dang / lab la sogs pa sgrib pa'i bye brag yin no //
analyzed: reg pa dang dri 'dzin pa la ni ras srab mo dang / gos nyis bltab tu byas pa dang / lab la sogs pa sgrib pa'i bye brag yin no //
translated: In the case of the apprehension of touch and smell, the specific obscurations are thin cloth, double cloth, wool, etc.

original: ro 'dzin ba la ni sgrib pa'i bye drag med do //
analyzed: ro 'dzin ba la ni sgrib pa'i bye drag med do //
translated: There is no specific obscuration in the case of the apprehension of taste.

original: sgrib pa 'dis sgra la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa 'dis sgra la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
translated: This obscuration is with regard to the object of sound, etc.

original: thos pa smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: thos pa smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: The mention of hearing is merely an illustration.

original: thos pa dang reg pa la sogs pa gsal ba dang mi gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa'i nus pa rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: thos pa dang reg pa la sogs pa gsal ba dang mi gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa'i nus pa rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The capacity of obscuration is understood because hearing, touch, etc. are seen to be clear or unclear.

original: gal te sgrib pa cung zad mi byed pa nyid @80b yin na ni de'i bye brag gis thos pa tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te sgrib pa cung zad mi byed pa nyid @80b yin na ni de'i bye brag gis thos pa tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If it does not obscure at all, how can there be a difference in hearing due to its specific nature?

original: de'i phyir de ltar sgrib pa'i bye brag gi rjes su byed pa'i phyir sgrib pa ni nus pa'i khyad par gegs byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar sgrib pa'i bye brag gi rjes su byed pa'i phyir sgrib pa ni nus pa'i khyad par gegs byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it conforms to the specific nature of obscuration, obscuration is the cause that obstructs the special capacity.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni cung zad mi byed pa de'i la lar yod pa de ni med pa dang khyad par med de /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni cung zad mi byed pa de'i la lar yod pa de ni med pa dang khyad par med de /
translated: If it were not so, i.e., if it did not exist, then it would be indistinguishable from non-existence.

original: yod pa dang med pa dag cung zad mi byed par mtshungs pa'i phyir de med pa dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa dag cung zad mi byed par mtshungs pa'i phyir de med pa dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because existence and non-existence are similar in not performing any function, it would be indistinguishable from non-existence.

original: des na 'di'i sgrib pa 'di yin no zhes nye bar bsdu ba 'brel ba ni rnam par rtog pas sbrul pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: des na 'di'i sgrib pa 'di yin no zhes nye bar bsdu ba 'brel ba ni rnam par rtog pas sbrul pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, the connection in the summary statement ‚Äúthis is the obscuration of that‚Äù would be a mere fabrication by conceptualization.

original: bsgrib pa'i bya ba gang yin pa de bsgrub pa'i rgyu ni ma yin no zhes gang smras pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrib pa'i bya ba gang yin pa de bsgrub pa'i rgyu ni ma yin no zhes gang smras pa ni /
translated: What was said, namely, that the cause of the establishment of the activity of obscuration is not a real entity,

original: dngos po la brten pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la brten pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: is not based on a real entity.

original: sgrib pa dngos po la 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib pa dngos po la 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no obscuration at all in a real entity.

original: 'di snyam du sgrib pa nyid du sgro btags pas de'i sgrib pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sgrib pa nyid du sgro btags pas de'i sgrib pa yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is the obscuration of that because it is imputed as an obscuration,

original: sgro btags pa'i rjes su byed pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i rjes su byed pa zhes smos so //
translated: then it is said that it is a mere fabrication by conceptualization.

original: sgro btags pa ni sgrub pa nyid du btags pa yin no ;
analyzed: sgro btags pa ni sgrub pa nyid du btags pa yin no ;
translated: The imputation is the imputation as an obscuration.

original: sgrib pa nyid ni shes pa skye ba'i nus pa gags byed pa'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: sgrib pa nyid ni shes pa skye ba'i nus pa gags byed pa'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Obscuration is the cause that obstructs the arising of knowledge.

original: de yang don byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang don byed pa yin no //
translated: And that is a real thing.

original: dngos po rnams kyi don byed pa yang sgro btags pa'i rjes su byed pa can ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi don byed pa yang sgro btags pa'i rjes su byed pa can ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The performance of an object‚Äôs function is not dependent on the superimposition of a nature.

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar gang gi phyir mi'i rang bzhin du sgro btags pa'i bram ze'i khye'u na 'tshed pa'i don byed pa bsgrub pa la me bzhin du nye bar sbyor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar gang gi phyir mi'i rang bzhin du sgro btags pa'i bram ze'i khye'u na 'tshed pa'i don byed pa bsgrub pa la me bzhin du nye bar sbyor ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as a Brahmin boy is not applied to the performance of the function of cooking because of the superimposition of a human nature,

original: gang gi phyir me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bram ze'i khye'u la sogs pa la sgro btags par snang yang de'i don byed mi nus pa de'i phyir sgrib pa dang me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin sgro 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtogs pa de yod kyang rtogs
analyzed: gang gi phyir me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bram ze'i khye'u la sogs pa la sgro btags par snang yang de'i don byed mi nus pa de'i phyir sgrib pa dang me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin sgro 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtogs pa de yod kyang rtogs
translated: because the Brahmin boy appears to have the nature of fire, etc., but is not able to perform the function of fire, etc., therefore, even though there is the cognition that has the characteristic of the superimposition of the nature of fire, etc., and obscuration,

original: pa des dngos po 'gyur ba gzhan du skye ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: pa des dngos po 'gyur ba gzhan du skye ba ma yin gyi /
translated: the thing does not arise as a different transformation because of that cognition.

original: 'on kyang dngos po rnams ni rang gi ngo bo las ma 'das par don byed par gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po rnams ni rang gi ngo bo las ma 'das par don byed par gnas pa nyid do //
translated: But things do not go beyond their own nature in order to perform a function.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa des na bar na 'dug pa'i sgrib pa yod kyang dbang po la sogs pa shes par bskyed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa des na bar na 'dug pa'i sgrib pa yod kyang dbang po la sogs pa shes par bskyed par 'gyur te /
translated: Since this is so, even when there is an obstruction between the sense faculty and the object, the sense faculty can still produce a consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that the sense faculty is still a causal condition for the production of consciousness.

original: sgrib pa des de dag la khyad par cung zad kyang ma byas pa'i phyir de dag gis shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa ni sa ma kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrib pa des de dag la khyad par cung zad kyang ma byas pa'i phyir de dag gis shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa ni sa ma kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: Since that obstruction does not affect the sense faculty in the least, the sense faculty‚Äôs ability to produce a consciousness is just as it was before.

original: 'du byed skad cig ma yin yang rgang dag las ci 'dra ba skye @81a * //
analyzed: 'du byed skad cig ma yin yang rgang dag las ci 'dra ba skye @81a * //
translated: Even though conditioned phenomena are momentary, we see that similar effects arise from similar causes.

original: bar mthong ba de dag la ni de 'dra ba skye ba yin no //
analyzed: bar mthong ba de dag la ni de 'dra ba skye ba yin no //
translated: Similar effects arise from similar causes.

original: skad cig tha dad par ni mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: skad cig tha dad par ni mi 'gyur te /
translated: They do not become different from moment to moment.

original: de lta ma yin na mig gcig la rnam par shes pa skye ba na yang gzhan gyi tshe shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mig gcig la rnam par shes pa skye ba na yang gzhan gyi tshe shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If that were not so, then when a consciousness arose in relation to one eye, a consciousness would not arise in relation to the other eye.

original: skad cig tha dad par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir yul gang na gnas pa'i dbang po la sogs pa 'bras bu skyed par mthong ba'i yul de na gnas pa nyid ni sgrib pa yod kyang nus pa bskyed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: skad cig tha dad par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir yul gang na gnas pa'i dbang po la sogs pa 'bras bu skyed par mthong ba'i yul de na gnas pa nyid ni sgrib pa yod kyang nus pa bskyed par 'gyur te /
translated: because they are similar in being different moments.

original: rgyu khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, when the sense faculties and so on that exist in a certain place are seen to produce effects, they generate the potential even when there is an obstruction, because the cause is not different.

original: de lta yang ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta yang ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa yin no //
translated: But that is not the case, so it is a cognition.

original: de'i phyir sgrib pas grogs byas pa dbang po la sogs pa'i rgyu dag las nus pa med pa skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrib pas grogs byas pa dbang po la sogs pa'i rgyu dag las nus pa med pa skyes pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the potential that is generated from the causes of the sense faculties and so on that are assisted by obstruction is produced without potential.

original: des na sgrib pa ni skyed par byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na sgrib pa ni skyed par byed pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, obstruction is only a producer.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yul chod pa med pa dag gi rgyu ni nus pa'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yul chod pa med pa dag gi rgyu ni nus pa'i rgyu yin la /
translated: For that very reason, the cause of unobstructed objects is the cause of potential.

original: yul chod pa rnams kyi skad cig dang por byung ba rnams kyi nus pa med pa'i rgyu ni bar chod kyi rgyu dang / lhan cig pa'i skyed bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: yul chod pa rnams kyi skad cig dang por byung ba rnams kyi nus pa med pa'i rgyu ni bar chod kyi rgyu dang / lhan cig pa'i skyed bar byed pa yin la /
translated: The cause of the first arising of obstructed objects is the cause of the non-potential that is obstructed, and the simultaneous producer is the cause of the potential.

original: skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni bar chod kyi rdzas dang lhan cig pa'i skyed par byed pa nus pa med pa'i rgyu yin no //üîΩskad cig ma rnams la yang rgyu gzhan 'ga' zhig dang 'brel pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: skad cig gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni bar chod kyi rdzas dang lhan cig pa'i skyed par byed pa nus pa med pa'i rgyu yin no // skad cig ma rnams la yang rgyu gzhan 'ga' zhig dang 'brel pa'i phyir ram /
translated: In the second moment and so on, the cause is a non-functioning cause that is simultaneous with the substance that obstructs.üîΩAlso, in the case of moments, the cause is a non-functioning cause that is simultaneous with the substance that obstructs.

original: rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu ma tshang ba las skabs su bab pa'i 'bras bu mi nus pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu ma tshang ba las skabs su bab pa'i 'bras bu mi nus pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are related to some other cause or because the cause of their stability is incomplete, the effect that is appropriate to the occasion is not produced.üîΩThus, darkness that is the co-existent cause of light obtains a distinction from darkness and the other moments of darkness do not have the ability to produce darkness.

original: 'di ltar snang ba'i lhan cig byed pa can gyi mun pa las khyad par thob pa'i mun pa'i skad cig gzhan ni mun pa skyed pa'i nus pa med par 'gyur ba dang de bzhin du grang ba'i reg pa'i rgyu ni tsha ba'i reg pa dang lhan cig pa'i
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba'i lhan cig byed pa can gyi mun pa las khyad par thob pa'i mun pa'i skad cig gzhan ni mun pa skyed pa'i nus pa med par 'gyur ba dang de bzhin du grang ba'i reg pa'i rgyu ni tsha ba'i reg pa dang lhan cig pa'i
translated: Similarly, the cause of cold contact is heat contact.üîΩWhen it arises from its own cause, it does not have the ability to produce cold contact.

original: rang gi rgyu las skye ba na nus pa med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du dbang po la sogs pa yang sgrib pa med pa'i rgyu las ni nus par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu las skye ba na nus pa med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du dbang po la sogs pa yang sgrib pa med pa'i rgyu las ni nus par 'gyur la /
translated: Similarly, the sense faculties and so on are able to produce their own effects when they arise from a cause that is not obstructed.

original: sgrib pa dang lhan cig pa dag las ni nus pa med par 'gyur ba yin no //üîΩde'i phyir phyogs dang po la ni sgrib pa rgyu ma tshang ba ston par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sgrib pa dang lhan cig pa dag las ni nus pa med par 'gyur ba yin no // de'i phyir phyogs dang po la ni sgrib pa rgyu ma tshang ba ston par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: But when they are associated with obscuration, they are not capable of doing so.

original: cung zad byed pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: cung zad byed pa ni ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, in the first case, the obscuration is the non-completion of the cause, but it is not an obscuration that does anything at all.

original: phyogs 'di la ni dbang po la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang lhan cig byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi sgrib pa cung zad byed pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs 'di la ni dbang po la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang lhan cig byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi sgrib pa cung zad byed pa yin no //
translated: But in this case, the obscuration is an obscuration that does something, i.e., it is an obscuration that is the cause of the production of the sense faculty, etc., and it is an obscuration that is the cause of the non-completion of the totality of the conditions.

original: de bzhin du sgra rnams ni 'ga' zhig yod na rung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par nyams pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra rnams ni 'ga' zhig yod na rung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par nyams pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, sounds are not impaired in the characteristic of being fit for existence when something exists.

original: dper na @81b rnam par rtog pa snga ma la skad cig ma rnams ltar ro //
analyzed: dper na @81b rnam par rtog pa snga ma la skad cig ma rnams ltar ro //
translated: For example, like the moments of the previous conceptualization.

original: khyad par skye ba yang yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par skye ba yang yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there the production of a difference,

original: dper na rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa bzhin no //
translated: for example, like the second conceptualization.

original: des na gal te de dag shes pa skye ba'i rang bzhin yin na rtogs pa po thams cad la thams cad kyi tshe ste /
analyzed: des na gal te de dag shes pa skye ba'i rang bzhin yin na rtogs pa po thams cad la thams cad kyi tshe ste /
translated: Therefore, if they are the nature of the production of consciousness, then for all understanders, at all times, and in all ways, consciousness would be produced.

original: sgrib pa dang bcas pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i gnas skabs thams cad du rang gi yul can te /üîΩdmigs pa can gyis shes par rim gyis 'byung ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgrib pa dang bcas pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i gnas skabs thams cad du rang gi yul can te / dmigs pa can gyis shes par rim gyis 'byung ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur te /
translated: It is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.

original: 'bras bu'i dus su mngon par 'dod pa bzhin no //üîΩyang na ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus su mngon par 'dod pa bzhin no // yang na ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.

original: mi byed pa'i dus bzhin no //
analyzed: mi byed pa'i dus bzhin no //
translated: It is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.

original: yin yang zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med pa'i dus gzhan gyi tshe yang ngo //üîΩgang la yang zhes bya ba ni rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i skyes bu la yang ngo //üîΩ'ga' yang zhes bya ba shes pa gcig kyang skyed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin no //
analyzed: yin yang zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med pa'i dus gzhan gyi tshe yang ngo // gang la yang zhes bya ba ni rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i skyes bu la yang ngo // 'ga' yang zhes bya ba shes pa gcig kyang skyed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin no //
translated: It is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.

original: tshad mas grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
analyzed: tshad mas grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
translated: It is the cause of all cognitions, whether they are obscured or unobscured, and whether they occur in sequence or not.üîΩIt is the cause of all cognitions

original: /'di snyam du zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa 'ga' zhig gis rung ba'i rang bzhin bzlog pa'i phyir sgra ma thos pa ni ma yin gyi /üîΩ'on kyang de dag rtogs par bya ba la rtsol ba zhes bya ba 'am /
analyzed: /'di snyam du zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa 'ga' zhig gis rung ba'i rang bzhin bzlog pa'i phyir sgra ma thos pa ni ma yin gyi / 'on kyang de dag rtogs par bya ba la rtsol ba zhes bya ba 'am /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit is not that the sound is not heard‚Äù means that it is not the case that the sound is not heard because of some obstruction.üîΩHowever, there is some other factor that is required for the sound to be cognized.

original: gzhan yang rung ste lhan cig byed pa 'ga' zhig yod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rung ste lhan cig byed pa 'ga' zhig yod pa'o //
