translated: This factor is called ‚Äúeffort‚Äù or ‚Äúsome other cooperating condition.‚Äù

original: 'o na ni lhan cig byed pa de nyen de thams cad kyang cig car thos par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni lhan cig byed pa de nyen de thams cad kyang cig car thos par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then all of the cooperating conditions would be present at the same time, and the sound would be heard at all times.

original: so sor nges zhes smos te /
analyzed: so sor nges zhes smos te /
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúThe conditions are not present in every case.‚Äù

original: sgra so so la gsal bar byed pa'i rtsol ba tha dad pa ni nges pa ste /
analyzed: sgra so so la gsal bar byed pa'i rtsol ba tha dad pa ni nges pa ste /
translated: The effort that causes the manifestation of each individual sound is distinct.

original: des na gang gi tshe gang gi gsal byed nges pa nye ba de nyid de'i tshe thos pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gang gi tshe gang gi gsal byed nges pa nye ba de nyid de'i tshe thos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, when the effort that causes the manifestation of a particular sound is present, that sound is heard.

original: de la 'di snyam du lhan cig byed pa des na ci zhig byas na lhan cig byed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du lhan cig byed pa des na ci zhig byas na lhan cig byed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: In this regard, if you ask, ‚ÄúWhat does the cooperating condition do?,‚Äù

original: dbang po la phan 'dogs pa 'am zhes smos so //
analyzed: dbang po la phan 'dogs pa 'am zhes smos so //
translated: the root text states, ‚ÄúIt assists the sense faculty.‚Äù

original: gsal bar byed pa de ni dbang po la phan 'dogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa de ni dbang po la phan 'dogs pa yin la /
translated: That which causes manifestation is that which benefits the sense faculty.

original: dbang po yang sgra'i lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir de yang sgra'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang po yang sgra'i lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir de yang sgra'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And since the sense faculty is the cooperating condition of sound, it too becomes the cooperating condition of sound.

original: gzhan yang rung zhes bya ba ni sgra de nyid la phan 'dogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang rung zhes bya ba ni sgra de nyid la phan 'dogs pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, it is suitable for that which is to be manifested to benefit the sound itself.

original: phan 'dogs pa yang nye ba tsam nyid yin no //üîΩ'di ltar nus pa 'jog par byed pa'am /
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa yang nye ba tsam nyid yin no // 'di ltar nus pa 'jog par byed pa'am /
translated: And that which benefits is merely the proximity of the sound.

original: byas pa'i nus pa yongs su smin pa yang nye bar gnas pa ni gsal byed kyi phan 'dogs pa yin ba pha rol po dag @82a * //üîΩ'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: byas pa'i nus pa yongs su smin pa yang nye bar gnas pa ni gsal byed kyi phan 'dogs pa yin ba pha rol po dag @82a * // 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the Sautrantikas assert that the benefit of manifestation is the placement of potential or the ripening of the potential of the object.

original: de la sgra rtag pa la nus pa 'jog pa dang yongs su smin pa dag mi 'thad ba'i phyir nye ba tsam gyis gsal byed phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de la sgra rtag pa la nus pa 'jog pa dang yongs su smin pa dag mi 'thad ba'i phyir nye ba tsam gyis gsal byed phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: Since it is untenable that permanent sound has potential or that it ripens, it is merely the proximity of the sound that benefits the manifestation.

original: gang gi phyir lhan cig byed pa de gnas skabs res 'ga' sgra 'ga' zhig la 'gyur ba de'i phyir sgra 'di dag ni res 'ga' 'ga' zhig tu thos pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i de nyid kyis byas pa yin no zhe na zhes de ltar sgrib pa'i phyogs
analyzed: gang gi phyir lhan cig byed pa de gnas skabs res 'ga' sgra 'ga' zhig la 'gyur ba de'i phyir sgra 'di dag ni res 'ga' 'ga' zhig tu thos pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i de nyid kyis byas pa yin no zhe na zhes de ltar sgrib pa'i phyogs
translated: Because the collection of causes and conditions sometimes becomes the cause of a certain sound, therefore, these sounds are sometimes heard by some, and that is due to the reality of the collection of causes and conditions.

original: las lhan cig byed pa'i phyogs gzhan nye bar bstan nas bzlog pa'i phyir kho bo cag ces smos so //
analyzed: las lhan cig byed pa'i phyogs gzhan nye bar bstan nas bzlog pa'i phyir kho bo cag ces smos so //
translated: Having thus presented the other side, that of the collection of causes and conditions, in order to refute that, he says, ‚ÄúWe do not say that.

original: lhan cig byed pa nye ba la ltos ba'i sa bon la sogs pa mthong yang lhan cig byed pa spang bar ni mi byed do //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa nye ba la ltos ba'i sa bon la sogs pa mthong yang lhan cig byed pa spang bar ni mi byed do //
translated: ‚Äù Although we see that seeds and so on depend on the proximity of the collection of causes and conditions, we do not deny the collection of causes and conditions.

original: 'on kyang rgyu rnams ni de'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i gnas skabs kyi phan 'dogs pa'i don la ltos pa nyid do //üîΩphan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa la ltos nas 'bras bu skyed na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu rnams ni de'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i gnas skabs kyi phan 'dogs pa'i don la ltos pa nyid do //üîΩphan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa la ltos nas 'bras bu skyed na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: However, causes are only related to the object that benefits them in the state of producing their effect.üîΩIf they produced an effect in dependence on that which does not benefit them, it would follow that anything could produce anything.

original: de'i gnas skabs kyi phan 'dogs pa la yang ci ste ltos she na /
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs kyi phan 'dogs pa la yang ci ste ltos she na /
translated: Why should it depend on the benefit that it provides in the present?

original: de la khyad par thob pa zhes smos so //üîΩde las khyad par thob bas 'bras bu byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de la khyad par thob pa zhes smos so // de las khyad par thob bas 'bras bu byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúit attains a special state.‚Äù

original: snga ma'i rang bzhin nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snga ma'i rang bzhin nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the attainment of a special state that is the effect, not the prior nature.

original: de la ci ltar sa bon la sogs pa lhan cig byed ba la ltos pa de bzhin du gal te sgra yang lhan cig byed sa 'ga' zhig la ltos nas shes pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu byed pa ni byed la rag ste /
analyzed: de la ci ltar sa bon la sogs pa lhan cig byed ba la ltos pa de bzhin du gal te sgra yang lhan cig byed sa 'ga' zhig la ltos nas shes pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu byed pa ni byed la rag ste /
translated: If, like seeds and so on, sound were to produce the effect called ‚Äúcognition‚Äù in dependence on some other cooperative condition, then that would be the case.

original: tshul 'di 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: tshul 'di 'gal ba yin no //
translated: But this is not the case.

original: ltos ba ni rang bzhin gzhan yin no zhes smras pa ni sngar gyi rang bzhin la nges pa zhes bya ba de ltar ni de mi 'gyur te mi rigs so //
analyzed: ltos ba ni rang bzhin gzhan yin no zhes smras pa ni sngar gyi rang bzhin la nges pa zhes bya ba de ltar ni de mi 'gyur te mi rigs so //
translated: The statement that ‚Äúdependence is a different nature‚Äù is not correct, because the prior nature is not ascertained in that way.

original: de'i rang bzhin khyad par dang ldan pa ni lhan cig byed pa dag las skyes pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin khyad par dang ldan pa ni lhan cig byed pa dag las skyes pa yin la /
translated: The nature of that is endowed with a special state that arises from the cooperative conditions.

original: sngar gyi khyad par dang bral ba ni 'gags pa yin te /
analyzed: sngar gyi khyad par dang bral ba ni 'gags pa yin te /
translated: The prior nature is devoid of that special state and is said to ‚Äúcease.‚Äù

original: dngos po tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa ni /
translated: The characteristic of a different thing is a different nature.

original: sngar gyi rang bzhin de ni nyams pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sngar gyi rang bzhin de ni nyams pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The former nature is destroyed.

original: ltos par bya ba'i rtsol ba'am zhes bya ba ni dngos su phan 'dogs pa'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: ltos par bya ba'i rtsol ba'am zhes bya ba ni dngos su phan 'dogs pa'i phyogs la'o //
translated: In the case of direct benefit, it is said, ‚Äúthe effort to be dependent.‚Äù

original: brgyud pas phan 'dogs pa la ni rtsol bas legs par byas pa'i dbang po 'am gzhan las zhes bya pa ste /
analyzed: brgyud pas phan 'dogs pa la ni rtsol bas legs par byas pa'i dbang po 'am gzhan las zhes bya pa ste /
translated: In the case of indirect benefit, it is said, ‚Äúthe faculties that are well-prepared by effort, or from another.‚Äù

original: phrad pa 'am bdag las rang bzhin gzhan thob pa'i rgyu'i phyir sngar gyi rang bzhin la nges par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: phrad pa 'am bdag las rang bzhin gzhan thob pa'i rgyu'i phyir sngar gyi rang bzhin la nges par mi 'thad do //
translated: Because of the cause of obtaining a different nature from the former nature, either through contact or from self, it is not tenable that the former nature is definite.

original: gal @82b te gsal bar byed pa rnams kyi phan 'dogs pa ni nye ba tsam yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal @82b te gsal bar byed pa rnams kyi phan 'dogs pa ni nye ba tsam yin no zhe na /
translated: If the benefit of those who clarify is merely proximity,

original: phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa ni zhes smos so //
translated: it is said, ‚Äúthat which does not benefit.‚Äù

original: cung zad mi byed pa nye ba yang mi nye ba dang khyad par med pa la ni ltos par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: cung zad mi byed pa nye ba yang mi nye ba dang khyad par med pa la ni ltos par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: That which does not do anything is not different from that which is not proximate, and it is not possible to depend on it.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig gzhan gyis ltos par bya ba de ni phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid yin gyi nye ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig gzhan gyis ltos par bya ba de ni phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid yin gyi nye ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which is to be relied upon by another is that which is helpful, not merely that which is near.

original: de lta ma yin na thams cad ltos par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na thams cad ltos par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were otherwise, then everything would be relied upon.

original: 'di snyam du nye ba de las phan pa 'ga' zhig yod pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du nye ba de las phan pa 'ga' zhig yod pa yin mod kyi /
translated: If you think that although that which is near is helpful,

original: de de'i bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de de'i bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not the nature of that.

original: de'i phyir phan pa yod kyang dngos po ni rang bzhin la nges pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: de'i phyir phan pa yod kyang dngos po ni rang bzhin la nges pa yin no snyam na /
translated: Therefore, although there is help, the nature of things is definite,

original: bshad pa / sgra de'i phan pa de las don gzhan yin na phan pa 'di ni sgra de'i yin no zhes 'brel pa dngos po yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / sgra de'i phan pa de las don gzhan yin na phan pa 'di ni sgra de'i yin no zhes 'brel pa dngos po yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: we reply: If that help of that sound is different from it, then the connection of this help with that sound would not be a real thing.

original: stsogs pa smos pas ni phan pa gzhan rtogs na thug pa med par thal ba'o //
analyzed: stsogs pa smos pas ni phan pa gzhan rtogs na thug pa med par thal ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù indicates that if one understands other kinds of help, the absurd consequence of infinite regress would follow.

original: phan pa de nyid las shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhes le'u gnyis par bshad zin to //
analyzed: phan pa de nyid las shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhes le'u gnyis par bshad zin to //
translated: We have already explained in Chapter Two that consciousness arises from that very help.

original: nyes pa gzhan yang sgra de shes bya ma yin par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan yang sgra de shes bya ma yin par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Another fault is that that sound would not be an object of knowledge.

original: shes bya ni skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: shes bya ni skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: The object of knowledge is the producer.

original: sgra ni skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Sound is not the producer,

original: lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gyis byas pa'i phan pa nyid las shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gyis byas pa'i phan pa nyid las shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the cognition arises from the mere benefit that is produced by the cooperating conditions.

original: 'di ltar shes pa ni de'i dus su byung ba'i phan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed kyi rtag tu yod pa'i sgra ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa ni de'i dus su byung ba'i phan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed kyi rtag tu yod pa'i sgra ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the cognition occurs at the time of the benefit, and it follows the benefit and ceases when the benefit ceases, but it does not occur from the sound that exists at all times.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa'i phyogs ni skyon chags pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa'i phyogs ni skyon chags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the position that they are different is faulty.

original: tha dad pa ma yin na ni phan pa rang bzhin nyid yin pas rang bzhin gzhan byas pas na sngar gyi rang bzhin nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin na ni phan pa rang bzhin nyid yin pas rang bzhin gzhan byas pas na sngar gyi rang bzhin nyams pa yin no //
translated: If they are not different, then the benefit is the nature of the cognition, and the cognition is produced by the nature of the benefit.

original: de'i phyir rtag par khas blangs pa'i sgra 'di ni'o//
analyzed: de'i phyir rtag par khas blangs pa'i sgra 'di ni'o//
translated: Therefore, the sound that is accepted as permanent is not the cause of the cognition.

original: phrad pa ni dbang po dang yul dag yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: phrad pa ni dbang po dang yul dag yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: Contact is the proper conjunction of the sense faculty and the object.

original: bdag ni skyes bu'o //
analyzed: bdag ni skyes bu'o //
translated: The self is the person.

original: gzhan yang rung ste zhes bya ba ni rtsol ba la sogs pa la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang rung ste zhes bya ba ni rtsol ba la sogs pa la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: Or something else means that it does not depend on effort and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: dbang po la sogs pa thams cad sgra'i bdag nyid de la cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa thams cad sgra'i bdag nyid de la cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the sense faculties and so on do not perform any function with regard to that which is sound by nature.

original: rtag pa'i phyir na tha mi dad pa'i bdag nyid byar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa'i phyir na tha mi dad pa'i bdag nyid byar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is permanent, it is not possible for it to have a different nature.

original: cung zad mi byed pa yang ltos par bya pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩshes pa skyed pa la rtag pa'i lhan cig byed par bkag pa 'dis ni dbang po dang sgra la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir rtsol ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gzhan gyis brjod pa gang @83a * //
analyzed: cung zad mi byed pa yang ltos par bya pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // shes pa skyed pa la rtag pa'i lhan cig byed par bkag pa 'dis ni dbang po dang sgra la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir rtsol ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gzhan gyis brjod pa gang @83a * //
translated: And that which does not perform any function is not dependent.

original: yin ba de gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: yin ba de gsal ba yin no //
translated: This refutation of the permanent as a cooperative condition in the production of consciousness clarifies what others have said about the application of effort being fruitful in the case of the sense faculties and sound.

original: ci ltar rtag pa'i lhan cig byed ba med ba de bzhin du phan 'dogs ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar rtag pa'i lhan cig byed ba med ba de bzhin du phan 'dogs ba med pa yin no //
translated: Just as it has no cooperative condition, so it has no benefit.

original: ltos pa med pa'i phyir rtsol ba sgra la phan 'dogs pa ma yin mod /
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i phyir rtsol ba sgra la phan 'dogs pa ma yin mod /
translated: Because it is independent, effort does not benefit sound.

original: rtsol ba dbang po la nye bar sbyor ba go ci ltar sbang zhe na /
analyzed: rtsol ba dbang po la nye bar sbyor ba go ci ltar sbang zhe na /
translated: But how is it that effort is applied to the sense faculties?

original: bshad pa / dbang po la phan btags pas kyang sgra'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bshad pa / dbang po la phan btags pas kyang sgra'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur te /
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: Even the benefit to the sense faculty would be the cooperating condition of sound,

original: rtsol ba la ltos par bya pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsol ba la ltos par bya pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be dependent on effort.

original: gal te sgra'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin na ni dbang po la phan btags pas rtsol ba la sgra'i ltos par bya bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin na ni dbang po la phan btags pas rtsol ba la sgra'i ltos par bya bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: If it were not the cooperating condition of sound, then the benefit to the sense faculty would be dependent on the sound‚Äôs effort.

original: de lta ma yin na dbang po la phan 'dogs pa'i rtsol ba la sgras ltos par bya ba yin no zhes bya gang la ci zhig 'brel ba yin /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dbang po la phan 'dogs pa'i rtsol ba la sgras ltos par bya ba yin no zhes bya gang la ci zhig 'brel ba yin /
translated: Otherwise, what connection would there be between the effort that benefits the sense faculty and the sound?

original: ltos pa med pa'i phyir sgra de'i lhan cig byed pa de yang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i phyir sgra de'i lhan cig byed pa de yang bsal ba yin no //
translated: Because it is not dependent on sound, that effort is also eliminated as its cooperating condition.

original: de'i phyir dbang po legs par byas pas kyang rtsol ba lhan cig byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po legs par byas pas kyang rtsol ba lhan cig byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even the benefit to the sense faculty is not the cooperating condition of effort.

original: dkyus ma nyid mjug bsdu ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: dkyus ma nyid mjug bsdu ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To conclude the main point, he says:

original: gang gi phyir dmigs par nus pa la rang bzhin gyi sgra nam yang rang gi rang bzhin las ma 'phos pa de'i phyir rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dmigs par nus pa la rang bzhin gyi sgra nam yang rang gi rang bzhin las ma 'phos pa de'i phyir rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the word ‚Äúnature‚Äù is never divorced from its nature, which is the ability to refer, it would always be perceived.

original: 'di ltar don ni shes pa skyed par nus pas mthong ba yang yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar don ni shes pa skyed par nus pas mthong ba yang yin no //
translated: In this way, an object is seen because it has the ability to produce a cognition.

original: sgra yang res 'ga' mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: sgra yang res 'ga' mthong ba yin te /
translated: And a word is sometimes seen,

original: de'i phyir shes pa skyed nus pa yin no //üîΩgal te 'ga' zhig las nus pa de thob pa ma yin pa 'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa skyed nus pa yin no // gal te 'ga' zhig las nus pa de thob pa ma yin pa 'am /
translated: so it has the ability to produce a cognition.üîΩIf it never loses the ability to produce a cognition,

original: nus pa de de las nam yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar na de rtag par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: nus pa de de las nam yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar na de rtag par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: or if it never obtains the ability to produce a cognition, then it would be permanent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shes la skyed par rung ba nyid sgra de las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes la skyed par rung ba nyid sgra de las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the ability to produce a cognition is not different from the word.

original: gal te tha mi dad pa'i nus pa skye ba dang nyams pa yin na de'i rang bzhin gyis sgra yang mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te tha mi dad pa'i nus pa skye ba dang nyams pa yin na de'i rang bzhin gyis sgra yang mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the ability, which is not different from the word, arises and ceases, then the word would be impermanent by nature.

original: 'on te nus pa tha dad par 'dod na nus pa don gzhan yin na yang skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te nus pa tha dad par 'dod na nus pa don gzhan yin na yang skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: But if you maintain that the potency is different, then even if the potency is a different object, there is a fault.

original: don gzhan ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: It is not a different object.

original: skyon ni 'brel pa mi rung ba dang / phan pa gzhan rtogs na thug pa med pa dang / phan pa las shes pa skye ba'i phyir sgra skyed par byed pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: skyon ni 'brel pa mi rung ba dang / phan pa gzhan rtogs na thug pa med pa dang / phan pa las shes pa skye ba'i phyir sgra skyed par byed pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: The fault is that a connection is not possible, and if the benefit is understood to be different, there is an infinite regress.

original: de'i phyir rtag tu dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtag tu dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it follows that it would always be perceived.

original: rtsol ba ma brtsams pa dang rgyun chad pa'i dus na ni 'di nam yang ma dmigs la /
analyzed: rtsol ba ma brtsams pa dang rgyun chad pa'i dus na ni 'di nam yang ma dmigs la /
translated: When effort is not begun or interrupted, it is never perceived.

original: gang gis 'di rtsol ba'i de ma thag tu @83b dmigs pa des na sgra de'i bdag nyid la rtsol ba 'di phan pa 'ga' zhig byed pa'i phan 'dogs pa po cung zhig yin no //
analyzed: gang gis 'di rtsol ba'i de ma thag tu @83b dmigs pa des na sgra de'i bdag nyid la rtsol ba 'di phan pa 'ga' zhig byed pa'i phan 'dogs pa po cung zhig yin no //
translated: But when it is perceived immediately after effort, then that effort is a slight benefactor that benefits the nature of that sound in some way.

original: rtsol ba shes pa nyid la ni phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtsol ba shes pa nyid la ni phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: But it does not benefit the cognition of effort itself.

original: sngar yod pa'i don gyi shes pa ni rtsol ba la rag las par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar yod pa'i don gyi shes pa ni rtsol ba la rag las par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that the consciousness of an object that already exists depends on effort.

original: 'on kyang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i don de nyid la rtsol ba phan 'dogs par byed par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i don de nyid la rtsol ba phan 'dogs par byed par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: However, it is understood that effort benefits the very object that arises immediately after effort.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bshad pa / byed pa po gang yin pa de'i chos mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / byed pa po gang yin pa de'i chos mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: Because the quality of the agent is seen.

original: sgra la ni rtsol ba'i byed pa po'i chos mthong gi shes par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra la ni rtsol ba'i byed pa po'i chos mthong gi shes par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The quality of the agent of sound is seen, but it is not the cause of consciousness.

original: sgrol ma la sogs pa'i shes par byed pa'i don ni dngos po grub zin pa rgyun gyis 'jug pa la rang gi yul can gyi shes pa skyed pa na shes par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: sgrol ma la sogs pa'i shes par byed pa'i don ni dngos po grub zin pa rgyun gyis 'jug pa la rang gi yul can gyi shes pa skyed pa na shes par byed pa yin te /
translated: The object that causes the cognition of PƒÅ·πá·∏çarƒÅ and so on is the cause of generating the consciousness that possesses its object in the continuum of an already established entity.

original: rang shes pas na gzhan blo'i rgyu zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rang shes pas na gzhan blo'i rgyu zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is explained that it is the cause of the cognition of another mind because it is self-cognized.

original: rtsol ba ni grub zin pa'i sgra las rang gi shes pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rtsol ba ni grub zin pa'i sgra las rang gi shes pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
translated: Effort is not the cause of one's consciousness from an already established sound.

original: 'on kyang de'i rang gi ngo bo bsgrub pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i rang gi ngo bo bsgrub pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: However, it is the cause of establishing its own nature.

original: dper na rdza mkhan gyi rtsol ba bum pa bsgrub pa'i rgyu yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rdza mkhan gyi rtsol ba bum pa bsgrub pa'i rgyu yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the potter‚Äôs effort is the cause of the production of the pot.

original: 'jig rten yang grub pa'i don gyi bdag nyid shes pa dang / ma grub pa bsgrub par bya ba dag nyams su myong ba kho nas rnam par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten yang grub pa'i don gyi bdag nyid shes pa dang / ma grub pa bsgrub par bya ba dag nyams su myong ba kho nas rnam par byed pa yin no //
translated: And the world also distinguishes between the known and the unknown, the produced and the unproduced, only through experience.

original: de'i phyir mar mes gsal bar bya ba dang / rdza mkhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i bum pa sgron ma'i gsal bya dang rdza mkhan gyi 'bras bur shes pa de bzhin du sgra yang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mar mes gsal bar bya ba dang / rdza mkhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i bum pa sgron ma'i gsal bya dang rdza mkhan gyi 'bras bur shes pa de bzhin du sgra yang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as the light of a lamp is the object of illumination and the pot produced by the potter is the effect of the potter, so sound is the effect of effort.

original: de lta ma yin na bum pa yang rdza mkhan gyi rtsol bas gsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir mtha' dag gsal byar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bum pa yang rdza mkhan gyi rtsol bas gsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir mtha' dag gsal byar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, since the pot is also the object of illumination by the potter‚Äôs effort, the entire pot would be the object of illumination.

original: byed pa po'i chos mthong ba de'i phyir sgra rtsol bas skyed pa yin pas na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i sgra'i shes pa /
analyzed: byed pa po'i chos mthong ba de'i phyir sgra rtsol bas skyed pa yin pas na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i sgra'i shes pa /
translated: Since the property of the agent is seen, sound is produced by effort. Therefore, the cognition of sound that occurs immediately after effort

original: rgyu sgra mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //üîΩgang du rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo nyid rjes su dpog pa der ni sa phyogs la sogs pa gzhan chos can yin la /
analyzed: rgyu sgra mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar gnas so // gang du rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo nyid rjes su dpog pa der ni sa phyogs la sogs pa gzhan chos can yin la /
translated: The sound is the effect of the nature of impermanence.üîΩIn the case of inferring the nature of the cause, the subject is something other than the place, etc.

original: gang du khyad par rjes su dpag par bya ba der ni de nyid chos can yin no //
analyzed: gang du khyad par rjes su dpag par bya ba der ni de nyid chos can yin no //
translated: In the case of inferring a specific property, that [cause] itself is the subject.

original: bskyed par bya ba'i 'brel pa can gyi shes pa las ni de'i khyad par mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba'i 'brel pa can gyi shes pa las ni de'i khyad par mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The specific property of impermanence is to be established from the cognition that is related to the object to be produced.

original: don 'di nyid bsdu ba'i phyir bshad ba /
analyzed: don 'di nyid bsdu ba'i phyir bshad ba /
translated: In order to summarize this point, it is said:

original: rtsol bas @84a * //
analyzed: rtsol bas @84a * //
translated: Effort

original: brtsams pa las sngar yang yod pa'i don gyi rnam par shes pa ni brtsal ma thag tu 'byung bar nges ba ma yin no //
analyzed: brtsams pa las sngar yang yod pa'i don gyi rnam par shes pa ni brtsal ma thag tu 'byung bar nges ba ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of an object that exists previously is not necessarily produced immediately after the effort.

original: don rang gi ngo bos shes pa de na ni sngar yang byed ba nyid de /
analyzed: don rang gi ngo bos shes pa de na ni sngar yang byed ba nyid de /
translated: If the object is cognized by its own nature, then it is already produced previously.

original: rtsol ba ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsol ba ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because effort is not necessary.

original: sgrib byed par ma chod ba dang dbang po dang sgra la rtsol ba nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib byed par ma chod ba dang dbang po dang sgra la rtsol ba nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the obstruction is not cut off, and because there is no application of effort to the sense faculty and sound.

original: rnam kun zhes bya ba ni sgra la phan 'dogs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rnam kun zhes bya ba ni sgra la phan 'dogs pa ma yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúIn every way‚Äù means that it does not assist sound,

original: sgra'i lhan cig byed pa yang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i lhan cig byed pa yang ma yin pa'o //
translated: and it is not a co-operating condition of sound.

original: gsal byed kyi yi ge ni skabs 'dir phan 'dogs par byed par mi gzung ste /
analyzed: gsal byed kyi yi ge ni skabs 'dir phan 'dogs par byed par mi gzung ste /
translated: The letters that manifest are not considered to assist in this context,

original: de nyid sgra yin ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid sgra yin ba'i phyir te /
translated: because they are sound itself,

original: gzhan ma dmigs ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan ma dmigs ba'i phyir ro //
translated: since nothing else is perceived.

original: 'on te nye bar sbyor ba med kyang ci'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te nye bar sbyor ba med kyang ci'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But even if there is no application, why doesn‚Äôt it occur immediately after effort?

original: gang gi phyir ltos pa med par res 'ga' ba'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ltos pa med par res 'ga' ba'i tshe /
translated: Because it is contradictory that, without dependence, sometimes

original: 'bras bu mi byed pa 'gal ba gang yin pa de'i phyir rtsol ba dang lhan cig 'bras bu byed par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi byed pa 'gal ba gang yin pa de'i phyir rtsol ba dang lhan cig 'bras bu byed par mi 'thad do //
translated: the effect is not produced, therefore it is not tenable that it produces the effect simultaneously with the effort.

original: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa 'di 'dra ba ni mthong ba yang yin no //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa 'di 'dra ba ni mthong ba yang yin no //
translated: But this kind of knowledge that occurs immediately after effort is seen.

original: de'i phyir rtsol ba la rag las pa'i shes pa 'di 'dra ba ni res 'ga'i don gyi 'bras bur grub pas de'i rtags yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsol ba la rag las pa'i shes pa 'di 'dra ba ni res 'ga'i don gyi 'bras bur grub pas de'i rtags yin no //
translated: Therefore, this kind of cognition that depends on effort is established as the effect of an occasional object, and that is its reason.

original: dper na brjod pa 'di nyid kyis gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa gang yin pa de'i yul gtan tshigs bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na brjod pa 'di nyid kyis gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa gang yin pa de'i yul gtan tshigs bstan pa yin no //
translated: For example, by this very statement, the definition of a reason, such as the property of the subject, is taught as the object of that reason.

original: bstan pa yin yang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi phyogs kyi chos dper brjod pa las rang bzhin gyi phyogs kyi chos logs shig tu byas pa ni gtan tshigs thams cad mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod pa de'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: bstan pa yin yang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi phyogs kyi chos dper brjod pa las rang bzhin gyi phyogs kyi chos logs shig tu byas pa ni gtan tshigs thams cad mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod pa de'i bdag nyid de /
translated: Although taught, the property of the subject of an effect reason is exemplified, and the property of the subject of an essential reason is treated separately, because all reasons exist in one part of the similar class, and that is their nature.

original: rang bzhin nam 'bras bu gang zhig mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod pa gang yin ba de nyid go bar byed pa ma yin par rtogs par mi 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin nam 'bras bu gang zhig mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod pa gang yin ba de nyid go bar byed pa ma yin par rtogs par mi 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That which exists in one part of the similar class, whether it is an essential property or an effect, is not understood to be the means of understanding.

original: gal te gtan tshigs kyi dbye ba 'chad na mtshan nyid kyang bshad dgos so //
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs kyi dbye ba 'chad na mtshan nyid kyang bshad dgos so //
translated: If you explain the division of the reason, you must also explain the definition.

original: 'on te rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa las mtshan nyid nges pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa las mtshan nyid nges pa yin na /
translated: But if the definition is ascertained from inference for oneself,

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa'i rang bzhin yang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par de nyid las nges par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa'i rang bzhin yang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par de nyid las nges par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then the nature that pervades the similar class will also be ascertained from that as the definition of the reason.

original: brjod par bya ba bsnyad pa yin yang gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag bar yang gtan tshigs kyi ngag brjod pa'i dbang du byas ba ni byis ba rnams bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba bsnyad pa yin yang gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag bar yang gtan tshigs kyi ngag brjod pa'i dbang du byas ba ni byis ba rnams bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though the topic has been stated, the statement of the reason is made from the perspective of inference for the sake of others, in order to make the distinction understood by the childish.

original: @84b de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: @84b de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: bshad zin pa'i don yang brjod ba ni mkhas pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bshad zin pa'i don yang brjod ba ni mkhas pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The statement of the already-explained meaning is not for the sake of making the learned understand,üîΩbut rather

original: mi mkhas pas don rtogs kyang ci lta ba bzhin brjod mi shes pa'i phyir rtogs par bya dgos pa de bzhin du mtshan nyid shes kyang dpe brjod pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de'i mthar thug pa kho na'i mtshan nyid yin par rtogs par 'gyur ba des
analyzed: mi mkhas pas don rtogs kyang ci lta ba bzhin brjod mi shes pa'i phyir rtogs par bya dgos pa de bzhin du mtshan nyid shes kyang dpe brjod pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de'i mthar thug pa kho na'i mtshan nyid yin par rtogs par 'gyur ba des
translated: Similarly, even though one knows the definition, one will understand that the example is the definition only of the property of the position, not of the entire property.

original: na bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dbye ba brjod bar bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: na bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dbye ba brjod bar bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, in order to understand the distinction, the division must be stated.

original: mtshan nyid ni gzhan brjod bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni gzhan brjod bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: But the definition need not be stated again.üîΩTherefore, here the master DignƒÅga or

original: des na 'dir dbye ba tsam zhig slob dpon phyogs kyi glang bo 'am /üîΩkho bos bshad kyi /
analyzed: des na 'dir dbye ba tsam zhig slob dpon phyogs kyi glang bo 'am / kho bos bshad kyi /
translated: I will state just the division.

original: mtshan nyid ni gang zhig rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par bshad pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni gang zhig rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par bshad pa de nyid yin no //
translated: The definition is just what was explained in the context of inference for oneself.

original: gal te dbye ba brjod ba gnyi ga yang bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin pa de lta na ni /
analyzed: gal te dbye ba brjod ba gnyi ga yang bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin pa de lta na ni /
translated: If both the statement of the division and the example are for the sake of understanding the distinction,

original: 'o na mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa'i rang bzhin dper brjod kyi /
analyzed: 'o na mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa'i rang bzhin dper brjod kyi /
translated: then why state the example of the nature that pervades the similar class?

original: phyogs gcig la yod pa ni ma yin pa des na de go bar byed pa nyid du mi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs gcig la yod pa ni ma yin pa des na de go bar byed pa nyid du mi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it exists in one part, it is not understood to be the very nature of the other part.üîΩIn response NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: bshad pa / dpe brjod pa 'dis ni phyogs gcig la yod pa'i rang bzhin gyi dpe brjod pa yang bshad par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / dpe brjod pa 'dis ni phyogs gcig la yod pa'i rang bzhin gyi dpe brjod pa yang bshad par rig par bya'o //
translated: This example also explains the example of intrinsic nature that exists in one part.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyogs gcig la yod pa gnyis kyi dpe brjod pa thun mong du brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyogs gcig la yod pa gnyis kyi dpe brjod pa thun mong du brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir zhes gsungs so ;
translated: For that very reason, the example of intrinsic nature that exists in one part is sought in common, because it is immediately arisen.

original: yang ci ltar na sgra 'dis rang bzhin nam 'bras bu brjod par nus she na /üîΩbshad pa / brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i gsal ba dang skyes pa dag la brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sgra 'dis brjod pa'i phyir de yang rtsol ba dang bar chod med par rtsol bas skyed pa 'am /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na sgra 'dis rang bzhin nam 'bras bu brjod par nus she na / bshad pa / brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i gsal ba dang skyes pa dag la brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sgra 'dis brjod pa'i phyir de yang rtsol ba dang bar chod med par rtsol bas skyed pa 'am /
translated: How is it that this term can express intrinsic nature or an effect?üîΩIn response NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: gsal bar byung ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gsal bar byung ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: Because the term ‚Äúimmediately arisen‚Äù expresses the manifest and the produced that are immediately arisen, that which is produced without delay by exertion or that which is manifest without delay is immediately arisen.

original: de lta yin dang rtsol ba dang bar chod med par 'byung ba'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba yin la /
analyzed: de lta yin dang rtsol ba dang bar chod med par 'byung ba'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu byung ba yin la /
translated: Because it arises without effort and obstruction, it arises immediately upon being sought.

original: byung ba yang rang gi ngo bo 'am /
analyzed: byung ba yang rang gi ngo bo 'am /
translated: And it arises by virtue of its own nature,

original: gsal ba nyid kyis yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid kyis yin te /
translated: or by virtue of its clarity.

original: ma gsal ba ni ma byung ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma gsal ba ni ma byung ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is not clear is the same as that which has not arisen.

original: gsal ba yang don gyis shes pa yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba yang don gyis shes pa yin te /
translated: And clarity is the cognition of an object.

original: des na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa'am skye ba yin no //
analyzed: des na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa'am skye ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, cognition or arising occurs immediately upon being sought.

original: shes pa ni 'bras bu yin la skye ba ni rang bzhin yin ba'i phyir gnyi ga brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa ni 'bras bu yin la skye ba ni rang bzhin yin ba'i phyir gnyi ga brjod pa yin no //
translated: Since cognition is the effect and arising is the intrinsic nature, both are stated.

original: ci'i phyir rang bzhin dang 'bras bu gnyis kyi dbye ba brjod ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rang bzhin dang 'bras bu gnyis kyi dbye ba brjod ce na /
translated: Why are both the intrinsic nature and the effect stated?

original: bshad pa / yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba 'am //üîΩ'bras bu gang yin pa de @85a * //
analyzed: bshad pa / yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba 'am // 'bras bu gang yin pa de @85a * //
translated: It is said: Whatever exists does not arise without it,

original: ni rgyu'i don de dang mi 'khrul zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: ni rgyu'i don de dang mi 'khrul zhes 'brel to //
translated: and whatever is the effect is not confused with its cause.

original: rang gi bdag nyid de bdag gi ba'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid de bdag gi ba'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa yang ngo //
translated: The reason is that it is its own nature, and it is its own intrinsic nature.

original: khyad par ci lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ci lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the difference?

original: rnam dbye med can te /
analyzed: rnam dbye med can te /
translated: It is not divisible.

original: phyogs gcig la yod pa ma yin pa dper na rtsol ba las byung ba la mi rtag pa bzhin no //
analyzed: phyogs gcig la yod pa ma yin pa dper na rtsol ba las byung ba la mi rtag pa bzhin no //
translated: It is not present in one part, like impermanence is in what is produced by effort.

original: gtan tshigs de ni rnam par dbyer med pa'i bdag de dang 'khrul mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de ni rnam par dbyer med pa'i bdag de dang 'khrul mi 'gyur te /
translated: That reason is not confused with that indivisible self,

original: yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
translated: because it is not abandoned.

original: gang zhig gang gis yongs su ma btang ba de ni de'i go bar byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis yongs su ma btang ba de ni de'i go bar byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba bshad pa yin no //
translated: In order to show that that which is not abandoned is the reason, the division of the reason is explained.

original: 'dis ni gang dag pha rol pos brtags pa'i gtan tshigs dag gtan tshigs ma yin par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni gang dag pha rol pos brtags pa'i gtan tshigs dag gtan tshigs ma yin par brjod pa yin no //
translated: By this, those reasons imagined by the opponent are said to be nonreasons.

original: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: ldan pa can sogs so //
analyzed: ldan pa can sogs so //
translated: Possession, etc.

original: ldan pa ni mel du ba'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni mel du ba'o //
translated: Possession is being endowed with.

original: don gcig la 'du ba can ni mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba can ni mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa lta bu'o //
translated: That which is endowed with is the possessor, like impermanence is in what is produced by effort.

original: ldan par gyur pa dang 'dus pa la sogs pa gzhan yang gzung ngo //
analyzed: ldan par gyur pa dang 'dus pa la sogs pa gzhan yang gzung ngo //
translated: Possession, being endowed with, being assembled, etc., are also accepted.

original: gzhan dag gis dpe brjod pa ni 'du ba can ni ba lang gi rva lta bu yin la /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis dpe brjod pa ni 'du ba can ni ba lang gi rva lta bu yin la /
translated: Others say: The possessor of the collection is like the horn of a cow.

original: don gcig la 'du ba can ni reg pa la sogs pa la gzugs bzhin no zhe'o //
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba can ni reg pa la sogs pa la gzugs bzhin no zhe'o //
translated: The possessor of the same object is like form in contact and so on.

original: 'di dag thams cad gtan tshigs ma yin pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad gtan tshigs ma yin pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: All of these are not reasons.

original: 'on kyang de dag gi nang nas bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can de 'dra ba'i 'brel pa yod min pa de dag nyid gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag gi nang nas bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can de 'dra ba'i 'brel pa yod min pa de dag nyid gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: However, from among them, those that do not have a relationship similar to that already explained are not reasons because

original: 'brel ba med pa la ni 'khrul ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel ba med pa la ni 'khrul ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is possible that they are confused about a relationship that does not exist.

original: de la gtan tshigs de dag la 'brel pa yod pa yin na ni 'brel pa de nyid nges pa'i sgrub byed yin te /
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs de dag la 'brel pa yod pa yin na ni 'brel pa de nyid nges pa'i sgrub byed yin te /
translated: If those reasons have a relationship, then that very relationship is the proof of ascertainment.

original: brjod pa'i ldan pa dang 'du ba dang don gcig la 'du ba la sogs pa rgyu mtshan med ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: brjod pa'i ldan pa dang 'du ba dang don gcig la 'du ba la sogs pa rgyu mtshan med ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the point of other meaningless statements such as the possessor of the collection, the possessor of the same object, and so on?

original: 'di snyam du 'du ba la sogs pa nges pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid la 'brel pa nges pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'du ba la sogs pa nges pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid la 'brel pa nges pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
translated: If you think that the existence of the cause of ascertainment is the relationship that ascertains the cause,üîΩthen what is the point of other meaningless statements such as the possessor of the collection, the possessor of the same object, and so on?

original: med na ni ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: med na ni ma yin no snyam na /
translated: If it does not exist, then it does not.

original: de ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de ni mi 'thad de /
translated: This is not tenable.

original: d'i ltar gtan tshigs kyis 'brel ba med ni ma 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba la nges pa yin no //
analyzed: d'i ltar gtan tshigs kyis 'brel ba med ni ma 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba la nges pa yin no //
translated: Because the reason is not related to the non-arisen, then it is ascertained in the probandum.

original: nges pa'i don gang yin pa de yang sgrub byed yin gyi /
analyzed: nges pa'i don gang yin pa de yang sgrub byed yin gyi /
translated: And that which has a definitive meaning is the proof.

original: nges pa med pa ni ldan par gyur kyang sgrub byed ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa med pa ni ldan par gyur kyang sgrub byed ma yin no //
translated: Even if it is related, that which is not ascertained is not the proof.

original: des na nges pa'i sgrub byed 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid yod na ldan pa can la sogs pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: des na nges pa'i sgrub byed 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid yod na ldan pa can la sogs pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Therefore, if the proof of the ascertained has the characteristic of a relation, what is the use of the related, etc.?

original: gsum pa ni 'bras bu @85b dang rang bzhin dag las gzhan ba'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni 'bras bu @85b dang rang bzhin dag las gzhan ba'o //
translated: The third is different from the effect and nature.

original: 'ga' zhi gtses bya ba ni thams cad ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhi gtses bya ba ni thams cad ma yin no //
translated: Some are to be harmed, but not all.

original: ji skad bshad ba'i mtshan nyid ni bltar rung ba mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji skad bshad ba'i mtshan nyid ni bltar rung ba mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the definition as explained is the non-observation of the visible.

original: de yang rang bzhin gyis khongs su 'dus pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin gyis khongs su 'dus pa yin te /
translated: And that is included in the nature.

original: de'i phyir te dper brjod ba nyid kyis dper brjod pa yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir te dper brjod ba nyid kyis dper brjod pa yin no ;
translated: Therefore, the example itself is the example.

original: gal te mi dmigs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te mi dmigs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin la /
translated: If you say that non-apprehension is the proof,

original: med pa yang 'ga' zhig gi khongs su 'dus pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: med pa yang 'ga' zhig gi khongs su 'dus pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: and that non-existence is not included in any of the three,

original: bshad pa / gang gi phyir dmigs su rung ste dmigs par 'os pa ni bltar rung ba med pa dag la ni /
analyzed: bshad pa / gang gi phyir dmigs su rung ste dmigs par 'os pa ni bltar rung ba med pa dag la ni /
translated: we reply: Because it is possible to apprehend, that is, to see, what is suitable to be apprehended,

original: mi dmigs ba las gzhan pa'i med la /
analyzed: mi dmigs ba las gzhan pa'i med la /
translated: then non-apprehension is nothing other than non-existence.

original: mi dmigs pa yang grub pa yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa yang grub pa yin no //
translated: And non-apprehension is established.

original: des na de'i phyir dngos po med pa ni mi sgrub bo //
analyzed: des na de'i phyir dngos po med pa ni mi sgrub bo //
translated: Therefore, non-existence is not established.

original: 'o na 'di gang gi rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ci zhig bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'di gang gi rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ci zhig bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: But what is it that is established, whose nature is this non-apprehension?

original: bshad pa / mi dmigs pa de yod pa'i rgyu las bum ba med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i rnam pa can med pa de'i sgra dang shes pa dag bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / mi dmigs pa de yod pa'i rgyu las bum ba med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i rnam pa can med pa de'i sgra dang shes pa dag bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: We reply: The word and the cognition of non-existence, which have the form ‚ÄúThe pot does not exist because of the existence of the cause of non-apprehension,‚Äù etc., are what is to be established.

original: ji lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: ji lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na /
translated: What is their nature?

original: de'i rgyu mtshan te de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can no //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan te de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can no //
translated: They have that as their reason, that is, they have that alone as their reason.

original: 'di ni le'u gnyis par bshad zin te /
analyzed: 'di ni le'u gnyis par bshad zin te /
translated: This has already been explained in Chapter Two.

original: bltar rung ba'i rang bzhin gyi don med pa ni mi dmigs pa las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: bltar rung ba'i rang bzhin gyi don med pa ni mi dmigs pa las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: The nonexistence of an object that can be perceived is nothing other than nonapprehension.

original: 'on kyang shes pa dang shes bya'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa dang shes bya'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: However, it is the nonapprehension of the nature of consciousness and the object of consciousness.

original: de yang grub pa yin la /
analyzed: de yang grub pa yin la /
translated: And that is established.

original: grub pa des ni de nyid bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: grub pa des ni de nyid bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: And by that establishment, that itself is not to be established.

original: 'on kyang mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can med pa'i shes pa dang / sgra dag bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bshad zin pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can med pa'i shes pa dang / sgra dag bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bshad zin pa yin no //
translated: However, it is explained that the consciousness of nonexistence and the words are to be established as having the reason of nonapprehension.

original: gal te med pa'i tha snyad mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin na de ltar zhes bya ba rgyu mtshan mi dmigs pa las rgyu mtshan can rtogs par ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te med pa'i tha snyad mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin na de ltar zhes bya ba rgyu mtshan mi dmigs pa las rgyu mtshan can rtogs par ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: If the convention of nonexistence is the reason of nonapprehension, then how is the possession of the reason understood from the nonapprehension of the reason?

original: ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it not understood?

original: rgyu yod kyang 'bras bu nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu yod kyang 'bras bu nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because even if the cause exists, the effect is not ascertained.

original: gang gi phyir bltar rung ba ma mthong ba la bltar rung ngam mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis med ces bya ba'i tha snyad 'di grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bltar rung ba ma mthong ba la bltar rung ngam mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis med ces bya ba'i tha snyad 'di grub pa yin no //
translated: Because the convention ‚Äúdoes not exist‚Äù is established on the basis of the reason ‚Äúnot seeing what can be seen,‚Äù or ‚Äúnot seeing what was seen.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir 'di mi dmigs pa'i 'bras bu yin yang de'i blo dang sgra la the tshom med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di mi dmigs pa'i 'bras bu yin yang de'i blo dang sgra la the tshom med do //
translated: Therefore, although this is the effect of non-apprehension, there is no doubt about the cognition or the word.

original: bltar rung ba mthong ba med par grub pa na 'bras bu ma zhugs pa ni rgyu ma tshang ba las nus pa ma yin na /
analyzed: bltar rung ba mthong ba med par grub pa na 'bras bu ma zhugs pa ni rgyu ma tshang ba las nus pa ma yin na /
translated: When the non-seeing of what can be seen is established, the non-engagement of the effect is due to the incompleteness of the cause.

original: 'di la ni zhugs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'di la ni zhugs pa nyid yin te /
translated: But in this case, there is engagement.

original: des na nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it is certain. This is the meaning.

original: @86a * // ji ltar nges she na /
analyzed: @86a * // ji ltar nges she na /
translated: How is it certain?

original: gang gi phyir 'brel pa ma yin par shes pa gang gis nges pa med par 'gyur ba 'di gdong rtogs par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'brel pa ma yin par shes pa gang gis nges pa med par 'gyur ba 'di gdong rtogs par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no certainty without the cognition of the connection, this is not to be understood.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: If not, then what?

original: 'brel pa shes zin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'brel pa shes zin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the connection is already known.

original: 'on kyang bltar rung ba mthong ba med pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis med do zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di yin par grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang bltar rung ba mthong ba med pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis med do zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di yin par grub pa nyid do //
translated: But it is established that the expression ‚Äúit does not exist‚Äù is due to the non-perception of the visible.

original: gal te rtogs par byed pa la yang bltar rung ba mthong ba med pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis tha snyad grub na /
analyzed: gal te rtogs par byed pa la yang bltar rung ba mthong ba med pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis tha snyad grub na /
translated: If the expression is established due to the non-perception of the visible in the cognition,

original: 'o na de gang la bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de gang la bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: then what is it that is to be established?

original: de dran par byed do zhes smos so //
analyzed: de dran par byed do zhes smos so //
translated: It is the memory of that.

original: gang zhig de la grub pa'i nye bar brjod pa med pa de dag la med pa'i tha snyad zhugs su zin kyang /
analyzed: gang zhig de la grub pa'i nye bar brjod pa med pa de dag la med pa'i tha snyad zhugs su zin kyang /
translated: Even though the expression ‚Äúit does not exist‚Äù is applied to those where there is no expression of establishment,

original: shes pa dang shes bya'i bdag nyid bltar rung ba mi dmigs pa'i yul yod na yang /
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya'i bdag nyid bltar rung ba mi dmigs pa'i yul yod na yang /
translated: in the case of the existence of the object of the non-perception of the visible, which is the nature of the cognition and the cognized,

original: de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad mi dran pa'i rtogs par byed pa de dran par byed do //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad mi dran pa'i rtogs par byed pa de dran par byed do //
translated: the memory of that cognition is due to the memory of the expression that has that as its reason.

original: rnam pa ci zhig ltar zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan gzhan sgro btags pa las so //
analyzed: rnam pa ci zhig ltar zhes bya ba ni rgyu mtshan gzhan sgro btags pa las so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn what way?‚Äù is from the superimposition of another reason.

original: mi dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not non-perception.

original: 'on kyang bdag gi sa rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid las tha snyad du byas pa yin no zhes rgyu mtshan la rmongs pa de khyod kyi rgyu mtshan 'di nyid las tha snyad du byas pa yin no zhes rgyu mtshan rab tu bstan pas yul dran par byed do //
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag gi sa rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid las tha snyad du byas pa yin no zhes rgyu mtshan la rmongs pa de khyod kyi rgyu mtshan 'di nyid las tha snyad du byas pa yin no zhes rgyu mtshan rab tu bstan pas yul dran par byed do //
translated: But when someone is confused about the reason, you cause him to remember the object by teaching the reason, saying, ‚ÄúI use the term in reference to this very reason.‚Äù

original: gal te rgyu mtshan la rmongs na de la de'i rgyu mtshan gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i tha snyad mi 'grub pa des na de ltar 'khrul pa med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu mtshan la rmongs na de la de'i rgyu mtshan gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i tha snyad mi 'grub pa des na de ltar 'khrul pa med pa yin zhe na /
translated: If someone is confused about the reason, then the use of the term that is to be established in reference to that reason is not established. Thus there is no error here.

original: bshad pa / med pa'i tha snyad la yul gang du yang snang ba mi dmigs pa las rgyu mtshan gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: bshad pa / med pa'i tha snyad la yul gang du yang snang ba mi dmigs pa las rgyu mtshan gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin la /
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: In the case of the term nonexistence, there is no reason at all other than the nonobservation of the appearance of any object.

original: de yang 'dis sngar lan cig ma yin par zhugs zin pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'dis sngar lan cig ma yin par zhugs zin pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, this [nonobservation] has already been engaged many times in the past.

original: gang gi phyir nges pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bcad pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nges pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bcad pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la /
translated: Because the engagement that possesses ascertainment has the nature of the exclusion of the object of desire.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bcad pa yang mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa bcad pa yin na 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bcad pa yang mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa bcad pa yin na 'gyur zhing /
translated: If the nature of the desired object is ascertained, then the nature of the undesired object is ascertained.

original: de bltar rung ba'i rang bzhin ma dmigs na yin no //
analyzed: de bltar rung ba'i rang bzhin ma dmigs na yin no //
translated: If the nature of the object suitable to appear is not observed, then it is ascertained.

original: des na med pa'i tha snyad dang lhan cig pa'i 'jug pa thams cad ni mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa de'i phyir med pa'i tha snyad ni thams cad kyis dpyad zin pa yin no //
analyzed: des na med pa'i tha snyad dang lhan cig pa'i 'jug pa thams cad ni mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa de'i phyir med pa'i tha snyad ni thams cad kyis dpyad zin pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, all instances of the term ‚Äúnonexistence‚Äù are based on the reason of nonapprehension. Thus, the term ‚Äúnonexistence‚Äù has already been analyzed in every way.

original: de'i phyir mi dmigs pa dang med pa'i tha snyad dag gi 'brel pa ni grub zin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi dmigs pa dang med pa'i tha snyad dag gi 'brel pa ni grub zin pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the relation between nonapprehension and the term ‚Äúnonexistence‚Äù is already established.

original: @86b bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: @86b bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not something to be established.

original: de'i phyir mi dmigs pas bsgrub par bya ba shes pa dang sgra dag ni rung ba nyid la the tshom med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi dmigs pas bsgrub par bya ba shes pa dang sgra dag ni rung ba nyid la the tshom med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, there is no doubt that the object to be established by nonapprehension is the suitability of cognition and sound.

original: 'dod pa la rag las pa'i tha snyad ni 'ga' zhig la rgyu mtshan yod kyang mi 'jug pa yang srid pa des na rung ba nyid rgyu mtshan gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi tha snyad dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa la rag las pa'i tha snyad ni 'ga' zhig la rgyu mtshan yod kyang mi 'jug pa yang srid pa des na rung ba nyid rgyu mtshan gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi tha snyad dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: The conventional expression ‚Äúdependent on desire‚Äù is sometimes used even when there is no reason for it. Therefore, the reason is the establishment of the suitability, not the establishment of the conventional expression.

original: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyis 'brel pa 'dod pas byas pa yin pa'i phyir rung ba nyid kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyis 'brel pa 'dod pas byas pa yin pa'i phyir rung ba nyid kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The reason is the establishment of the suitability, because the relation between the reason and the thing to be established is accepted as being created.

original: gang du 'brel pa dngos por gyur pa der ni rung ba'i rgyur gnas skabs tha ma thob pa las de ma thag pa nyid du 'bras bu mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'bras bu dngos sam rung ba nyid kyang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du 'brel pa dngos por gyur pa der ni rung ba'i rgyur gnas skabs tha ma thob pa las de ma thag pa nyid du 'bras bu mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'bras bu dngos sam rung ba nyid kyang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Where the relation is real, the suitability is established as the cause, because the effect is directly perceived immediately after the final moment of the cause.

original: dpe brjod pa ni lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir 'di ni ba lang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe brjod pa ni lkog shal la sogs pa 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir 'di ni ba lang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The example is ‚ÄúThis is a cow,‚Äù because the hump and so on are assembled.

original: 'di ba lang chen po dang khra bo la sogs pa la ba lang gi tha snyad zhugs su zin kyang gang gi tshe blun pas chen po la sogs pa nyid rgyu mtshan yin par sgro btags te /üîΩchung ngu la sogs pa la rgyu mtshan med par bsams nas ba lang gi tha snyad mi 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe tha snyad 'di ni lkog shal la sogs pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can yin no zhes lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa cam ba
analyzed: 'di ba lang chen po dang khra bo la sogs pa la ba lang gi tha snyad zhugs su zin kyang gang gi tshe blun pas chen po la sogs pa nyid rgyu mtshan yin par sgro btags te / chung ngu la sogs pa la rgyu mtshan med par bsams nas ba lang gi tha snyad mi 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe tha snyad 'di ni lkog shal la sogs pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can yin no zhes lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa cam ba
translated: Although the term ‚Äúcow‚Äù is applied to a great cow, a variegated cow, and so on, when a fool superimposes the reason, ‚Äúgreatness,‚Äù and so on,

original: lang gi tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan can du bstan nas brda dran par byed do //
analyzed: lang gi tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan can du bstan nas brda dran par byed do //
translated: and thinks that ‚Äúsmallness,‚Äù and so on, are not the reason, and he does not apply the term ‚Äúcow,‚Äù then at that time, the term ‚Äúcow‚Äù is taught to be a mere reason of the dewlap, and so on, and the convention is remembered.

original: gal te 'brel pa grub na rgyu mtshan mthong nas tha snyad 'jug par mi byed par ci ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa grub na rgyu mtshan mthong nas tha snyad 'jug par mi byed par ci ltar 'gyur te /
translated: If the connection is established, then why would one not apply the term after seeing the reason?

original: dper na lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa las shing gi tha snyad bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa las shing gi tha snyad bzhin no zhe na /
translated: For example, it is like the convention of a tree from possessing leaves and so on.

original: yul yod na yang ste nye bar gnas pa la de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad zhugs su zin kyang rgyu mtshan la yang rmongs pas skabs su bab pa'i yul 'dis rjes su mi brjod pa ste /
analyzed: yul yod na yang ste nye bar gnas pa la de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad zhugs su zin kyang rgyu mtshan la yang rmongs pas skabs su bab pa'i yul 'dis rjes su mi brjod pa ste /
translated: Even if the object exists, and is present, and the conventional expression is used in regard to it, still, because of ignorance of the reason, the expression is not used in regard to the present object.

original: tha snyad du mi byed pa'am ma rtogs pa ni grub pa med pa'i tha snyad zhugs pa'i yul dang 'dra ba'i phyir skabs su bab pa'i yul la mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi brda rmongs pa la dran par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: tha snyad du mi byed pa'am ma rtogs pa ni grub pa med pa'i tha snyad zhugs pa'i yul dang 'dra ba'i phyir skabs su bab pa'i yul la mi dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi brda rmongs pa la dran par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: The non-use of the conventional expression, or the non-understanding, is like the use of the conventional expression in regard to a non-existent object. Therefore, in regard to the present object, the conventional expression is used only because of the ignorance of the sign of non-apprehension.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dper na rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid sgrub pa bzhin no //üîΩmngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis grub par bstan pa'i phyir dngos @87a * //
analyzed: dper na rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid sgrub pa bzhin no // mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis grub par bstan pa'i phyir dngos @87a * //
translated: For example, like the establishment of cause and effect.

original: po dang dngos po med ba dag mthong ba dang mthong ba dag gis sgra brjod de dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid dran par byed do //
analyzed: po dang dngos po med ba dag mthong ba dang mthong ba dag gis sgra brjod de dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid dran par byed do //
translated: In order to show that it is established by perception and non-apprehension, the conventional expression of existence and non-existence is used in regard to the seen and the unseen. The suitability of the conventional expression of cause and effect is recalled.

original: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ni gnyis 'brel pa yin gyi /üîΩdngos po dang dngos po med pa tsam ni ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ni gnyis 'brel pa yin gyi / dngos po dang dngos po med pa tsam ni ma yin na /
translated: If cause and effect are related as two things,

original: de ji ltar tha snyad du rung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar tha snyad du rung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: then how can the mere existence and nonexistence of things be established as suitable as the referent of conventions?

original: gang gi phyir mthong ba dang ma mthong ba de gnyis nyid la 'bras bu dang rgyu dang bskyed bya dang skyed byed la sogs pa'i sgra tha snyad kyi don du bkod pa yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mthong ba dang ma mthong ba de gnyis nyid la 'bras bu dang rgyu dang bskyed bya dang skyed byed la sogs pa'i sgra tha snyad kyi don du bkod pa yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because the terms effect and cause, product and producer, and so on are posited as the referents of conventions in relation to those two, seeing and not seeing,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid gzhan ni bsgrub par bya ba med do //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid gzhan ni bsgrub par bya ba med do //
translated: therefore, otherness of cause and effect is not to be established.

original: rgyu yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa nyid 'brel pa yin gyi gzhan ni dga' yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa nyid 'brel pa yin gyi gzhan ni dga' yang ma yin no //
translated: The existence and nonexistence of the effect is related to the existence and nonexistence of the cause, but not to anything else, even if one likes.

original: de'i phyir 'dir yang blun pas brda byas zin pa la rgyu mtshan sgro btags nas yul can mi dran pa dran par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir yang blun pas brda byas zin pa la rgyu mtshan sgro btags nas yul can mi dran pa dran par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, here too, the fool, having imputed a reason to what has already been signified, causes the nonrecollection of the object to be remembered.

original: zhar la phyung ba mjug bsdus nas gnyug ma nyid bshad pa /
analyzed: zhar la phyung ba mjug bsdus nas gnyug ma nyid bshad pa /
translated: Having concluded the digression, he explains the intrinsic nature.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu rab tu grub pa 'di ni gtan tshigs kyis rab tu dbye ba bshad pa /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu rab tu grub pa 'di ni gtan tshigs kyis rab tu dbye ba bshad pa /
translated: The establishment of the effect from the cause is the explanation of the division of the reason.

original: tha dad par dper ma brjod de /
analyzed: tha dad par dper ma brjod de /
translated: A different example is not mentioned,

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is included in the reason of intrinsic nature.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rung ba nyid bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rung ba nyid bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the suitability is the probandum.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu rab tu grub pa la the tshom med du chug mod /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu rab tu grub pa la the tshom med du chug mod /
translated: Even if one allows that the establishment of the effect from the cause is without doubt,

original: rang bzhin gyi nang du 'dus par go ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi nang du 'dus par go ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how is it understood that it is included in the intrinsic nature?

original: bshad pa / sa phyogs dang shes par rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa las ni khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid bsgrub po //
analyzed: bshad pa / sa phyogs dang shes par rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa las ni khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid bsgrub po //
translated: In response to that, it is said: From the non-apprehension of the intrinsic nature in the place and cognition, the suitability of the absence of the intrinsic nature of the pervader is established.

original: khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa yang gang du 'grub ce na /
analyzed: khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa yang gang du 'grub ce na /
translated: Where is the pervaded and the pervader established?

original: khyab pa yang gzhan du zhes smos so //
analyzed: khyab pa yang gzhan du zhes smos so //
translated: The pervasion is also established elsewhere.

original: yul gzhan du rab tu zhugs pa'i tha snyad mi dmigs pa tsam las grub cing /üîΩgrub pa de rgyur gyur pas na khyab pa grub po //
analyzed: yul gzhan du rab tu zhugs pa'i tha snyad mi dmigs pa tsam las grub cing / grub pa de rgyur gyur pas na khyab pa grub po //
translated: The mere non-apprehension of the convention of going to another place is established.üîΩAnd since that establishment is the cause, the pervasion is established.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan nyid du gcig la rab tu grub pas kyang rung ba nyid rgyu mtshan gyis khyab par byed par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan nyid du gcig la rab tu grub pas kyang rung ba nyid rgyu mtshan gyis khyab par byed par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: And since that very reason is established in one, the pervasion is established by the reason.

original: des na de ltar mi dmigs pa rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa nyid bum pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar mi dmigs pa rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa nyid bum pa med pa yin no //
translated: Thus, since non-apprehension is included within the natural reason, non-apprehension itself is the absence of the pot.

original: da yang grub pa yin la /
analyzed: da yang grub pa yin la /
translated: And that is established.

original: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa med pa des med pa'i tha snyad @87b du rung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes le'u gnyis pa dang 'dir yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa med pa des med pa'i tha snyad @87b du rung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes le'u gnyis pa dang 'dir yang bshad zin to //
translated: And by that non-apprehension which is the absence of the nature of apprehension, the mere convention of absence is established as the probandum. This has been explained in the second chapter and here as well.

original: gang las med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ba med pa'i bdag nyid kyis mi dmigs pa de nyid ci ltar 'grub cing med pa de shes pa med par nges pa'i rgyur yang ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang las med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ba med pa'i bdag nyid kyis mi dmigs pa de nyid ci ltar 'grub cing med pa de shes pa med par nges pa'i rgyur yang ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can that which is not observed due to the nature of nonexistence be established? And how can it be the cause of the ascertainment that consciousness does not exist?

original: ci 'dra ba zhig mi dmigs pa yin par 'dod pa de mi shes pas bdag la dris so snyam nas /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig mi dmigs pa yin par 'dod pa de mi shes pas bdag la dris so snyam nas /
translated: Thinking that he does not understand what kind of nonobservation is accepted, he says:

original: nyes pa 'di ni med do zhes smos so //
analyzed: nyes pa 'di ni med do zhes smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúThis fault does not exist.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i don gcig gi dmigs par nyams su myong ba las dngos po 'di ni dmigs so zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i don gcig gi dmigs par nyams su myong ba las dngos po 'di ni dmigs so zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Thus, the thought arises that the object is observed or that it is not observed, because it is experienced as the object of observation of a single object that is not mixed with another.

original: ma dmigs so zhes dmigs pa grub pa dang 'gog pa'i rnam par rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma dmigs so zhes dmigs pa grub pa dang 'gog pa'i rnam par rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The thought that it is established or that it is refuted arises.

original: gcig dmigs nyams su myong ba las //
analyzed: gcig dmigs nyams su myong ba las //
translated: From the experience of the observation of a single object,

original: zhes bya ba gang las she na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: gang gi phyir gang las shes pa med par nges pa'i phyir ro //
